job_text: ['', ' Is comfortable working with teams, sharing code among peers, and presenting to leadership.', ' Analyze data and build predictive and prescriptive models in a wide range of areas including customer segmentation and lifetime, business performance, customer clustering, capacity planning, asset profitablity, cost management, and various other areas.', 'The Main Responsibilities', 'The Role', ' Strong communication skills and relationship skills.', ' Ability to write customized algorithms to drive predictive and prescriptive analysis in business management, creating actionable recommendations to improve Financial Decisions.', ' Python and/or R data script writing.', ' Analyze data and build predictive and prescriptive models in a wide range of areas including customer segmentation and lifetime, business performance, customer clustering, capacity planning, asset profitablity, cost management, and various other areas. Mine information for previously unknown patterns and insights hidden in these assets and leverage them for competitive advantage. The problems solved will be at the cutting edge of technology and will lie at the intersection of science, engineering, and business acumen. Be part of a highly skilled agile team and within the Consumer Finance team.', 'EEO Statement', ' Experience with SQL, database navigation in an Oracle data environment and Data Lake unstructured environments.', ' Experience with SQL, database navigation in an Oracle data environment and Data Lake unstructured environments. Python and/or R data script writing. Very strong in math and statistics at the post graduate level. Masters in a mathematical and modeling discipline a must, PHD preferred. Experienced in writing formulas, expressions and algorithms as needed to support analytical work. Understands how to explore unstructured data to gain insights and build models to produce results. Strong communication skills and relationship skills.', ' Mine information for previously unknown patterns and insights hidden in these assets and leverage them for competitive advantage.', ' Has a genuine drive to succeed and self-motivated to take care of business , while positively representing the team.', 'Qualifications', ' Ability to perform ad-hoc statistical analysis including correlation analysis, frequency distribution analysis, probabilistic modeling, sophisticated forecasting, and academic based predictive and prescriptive methods.', ' Ability to perform ad-hoc statistical analysis including correlation analysis, frequency distribution analysis, probabilistic modeling, sophisticated forecasting, and academic based predictive and prescriptive methods. Capable of modeling the relationships between many sources of raw data, develop models that can serve to provide insight to support decision making and guide financial decisions. Ability to write customized algorithms to drive predictive and prescriptive analysis in business management, creating actionable recommendations to improve Financial Decisions. Can be flexible to work on various types of projects, often balancing multiple deliverables with a wide range of complexity requirements. Is comfortable working with teams, sharing code among peers, and presenting to leadership. Has a genuine drive to succeed and self-motivated to take care of business , while positively representing the team.', 'What To Expect Next', ' Can be flexible to work on various types of projects, often balancing multiple deliverables with a wide range of complexity requirements.', 'About Lumen', ' The problems solved will be at the cutting edge of technology and will lie at the intersection of science, engineering, and business acumen.', 'Disclaimer', ' Masters in a mathematical and modeling discipline a must, PHD preferred.', ' Understands how to explore unstructured data to gain insights and build models to produce results.', ' Capable of modeling the relationships between many sources of raw data, develop models that can serve to provide insight to support decision making and guide financial decisions.', 'What We Look For in a Candidate', ' Very strong in math and statistics at the post graduate level.', ' Be part of a highly skilled agile team and within the Consumer Finance team.', ' Experienced in writing formulas, expressions and algorithms as needed to support analytical work.']

['', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'Reviewable code samples or community participation.', 'You invest time in the team by helping others with their tasks and professional development. This could include suggesting ideas, sharing best practices, and pairing occasionally.', 'You have 5+ years of professional experience writing NLP software.', 'Java expertise. If not, you are at least being open to learning and using it.', 'Competitive compensation and full benefits including medical, dental, vision, 401(k) with matching, short and long term disability insurance, tuition reimbursement, and more', 'The Role', 'You write code which is reviewed by other engineers, and you review their code as well.', 'You experiment with new models, algorithms and heuristics to obtain new and more accurate insights into litigation behavior.', 'Compensation, Benefits, and Location', 'RSRLNLP', 'You spend time learning about new technologies to produce more reliable and explainable results.', 'A Typical Week', 'You work well in a team-oriented organization due to your excellent communication skills and empathy.', 'Experience applying deep neural networks (e.g, PyTorch, TensorFlow) to real-world problems, especially in information extraction.', 'We launched Lex Machina in 2011 for patent litigators and are now expanding Legal Analytics to all areas of the law with the help of LexisNexis, our parent company. Since being acquired in 2015, we have become one of the fastest growing businesses in LexisNexis. We have retained our start-up like culture and pace, but are now backed with the stability of a big company.', 'You have 5+ years of professional experience writing NLP software.You code in Java and/or Python.You have SQL experience.You work well in a team-oriented organization due to your excellent communication skills and empathy.You have a Masters degree in Computer Science, or a related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, code academy, or work experience.', 'You work with the engineers, product leaders, and legal experts to help decide what to build and whether what we built is working.', 'You work with the engineers, product leaders, and legal experts to help decide what to build and whether what we built is working.You experiment with new models, algorithms and heuristics to obtain new and more accurate insights into litigation behavior.You write code which is reviewed by other engineers, and you review their code as well.You invest time in the team by helping others with their tasks and professional development. This could include suggesting ideas, sharing best practices, and pairing occasionally.You spend time learning about new technologies to produce more reliable and explainable results.', 'Extras', 'Experience applying deep neural networks (e.g, PyTorch, TensorFlow) to real-world problems, especially in information extraction.Java expertise. If not, you are at least being open to learning and using it.Lucene and/or Elasticsearch experience.Reviewable code samples or community participation.', 'Relocation support available.', 'The Company', 'You have SQL experience.', 'The Lex Machina product provides Legal Analytics to companies and law firms, enabling them to craft successful litigation strategies, win cases, and close business. We are the pioneers of Legal Analytics and our award-winning product is used by global corporations such as Google, eBay, Yahoo!, IBM, and Nike, as well as most of the AmLaw 100 law firms like Wilson Sonsini, Fish & Richardson, Greenberg Traurig, and Fenwick & West.', 'Competitive compensation and full benefits including medical, dental, vision, 401(k) with matching, short and long term disability insurance, tuition reimbursement, and moreThis position is available in our Menlo Park, CA office headquarters, and includes the flexibility of working from home one day per week.We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'Use your knowledge of Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning to improve Lex Machina’s underlying dataset as we bring Legal Analytics to all areas of the law. As a member of our tight-knit remote product and engineering team, you will work with in-house legal experts, customers, and our design team to integrate new legal content and improve our analytics. Our NLP systems are written in Java and Python and deployed in Google Cloud Services. We use a number of proprietary tools as well as third party libraries such as scikit-learn and pytorch.', 'You code in Java and/or Python.', 'Lucene and/or Elasticsearch experience.', 'This position is available in our Menlo Park, CA office headquarters, and includes the flexibility of working from home one day per week.', 'You have a Masters degree in Computer Science, or a related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, code academy, or work experience.', 'Requirements']

['', 'Experience we love to see:', ' Building production machine learning models that identify fraud Designing new algorithms that optimize all the key components of the Signifyd Commerce Protection Platform Writing production and offline analytical code in Python and Java Researching real-time emerging fraud patterns with the Risk Analysis team Working with distributed data pipelines Communicating complex ideas effectively to a variety of audiences Collaborating with engineering teams to continuously strengthen our machine learning pipeline Mentoring other members of the team ', 'Communicating complex ideas effectively to a variety of audiences', "This position requires you to be located in the USMust be willing to work EST hoursThe Data Science team at Signifyd builds the models that power our fraud detection engine. We make fraud prevention at scale possible. Our machine learning pipeline keeps us one step ahead of fraudsters and their constantly evolving tactics and our research and experiments develop into new products that improve the merchant payments experience.We expect our data scientists to be hands-on. We carry solutions from a brainstorm to experimentation and all the way to deployment. Some days you may spend doing research and designing experiments while others are spent using your analytical toolbox to surface insights into real-time fraud attacks. We're a varied group with a diversity of strengths -- some team members came to us from academic backgrounds, others from engineering, some from big companies and some from small, but all of us are curious and collaborative.How you'll have an impact: Building production machine learning models that identify fraud Designing new algorithms that optimize all the key components of the Signifyd ['', ' 5-7 years of experience working in web, product, customer, care, or other related analytics fields. Ability to tell stories with data, educate effectively, and instill confidence, motivating stakeholders to act on recommendations. 3+ years applied data science/data modeling experience. Ability to Analyze large amounts of structured and unstructured data and determine suitability for modeling. Broad understanding and demonstrated history of applying various algorithms to business use cases to drive business and customer value. Strong modeling foundation – hands-on expertise with data mining and statistical modeling techniques such as clustering, classification, regression, tree-based methods, neural nets, support vector machines, anomaly detection, and natural language processing. Expertise with NLP is a plus. Expertise in modern advanced analytical tools and programming languages such as Python (highly preferred – will be used in this role), Scala, or R. Efficient in SQL, Hive, SparkSQL, etc. Ability to manage projects end-to-end to meet objectives and deadlines. Outstanding communications skills with both technical and non-technical colleagues. MS in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Economics, Operations Research, or equivalent is preferred.', ' Own projects from the team’s backlog, and partner directly with business partners to effectively execute on a co-owned and evolving product strategy.', ' Partner with cross-functional stakeholders to better understand our users and create a single, accurate view of a customer across businesses to make decisions about how best to acquire/retain them, segment, identify high potential value, and proactively interact with them.', "What You'll Bring", ' Continuously contribute to the enablement, development, and deployment of ML-driven solutions to integrate within our applications, amplifying our capabilities, automate decision-making, and provide predictive intelligence.', ' Pursue data quality, troubleshoot data validation, and see issues to resolution.', ' Contribute to the enablement the development and onboarding of Self-Service Machine Learning frameworks to scale ML capabilities', ' Ability to communicate complex analytical concepts clearly and concisely both in written form and verbally to both technical and non-technical audiences, with a track record of strong partnerships with key stakeholders and clients across multiple functions', ' Conduct evaluations and assessments of new tools and technologies to ensure that the team stays at the frontier of Analytics.', 'How You Will Lead', ' Strong modeling foundation – hands-on expertise with data mining and statistical modeling techniques such as clustering, classification, regression, tree-based methods, neural nets, support vector machines, anomaly detection, and natural language processing. Expertise with NLP is a plus.', ' Deliver advanced Data Science capabilities in a meaningful manner through successful proof-of-concept solutions, and later on, smoothly transition the proof-of-concept into production.', ' Lead projects with hands-on analysis and modeling, drawing from multiple analytical methods to choose the right tool and right level of complexity appropriate for the business challenges', ' Ability to manage projects end-to-end to meet objectives and deadlines.', ' Collect, analyze, and model available data to advance the customer analytics space and build a broad understanding of the Consumer Group’s customers and relevant customer segments.', ' Outstanding communications skills with both technical and non-technical colleagues.', ' Expertise in modern advanced analytical tools and programming languages such as Python (highly preferred – will be used in this role), Scala, or R. Efficient in SQL, Hive, SparkSQL, etc.', ' 3+ years applied data science/data modeling experience. Ability to Analyze large amounts of structured and unstructured data and determine suitability for modeling. Broad understanding and demonstrated history of applying various algorithms to business use cases to drive business and customer value.', ' MS in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Economics, Operations Research, or equivalent is preferred.', ' Partner with cross-functional stakeholders to better understand our users and create a single, accurate view of a customer across businesses to make decisions about how best to acquire/retain them, segment, identify high potential value, and proactively interact with them. Own projects from the team’s backlog, and partner directly with business partners to effectively execute on a co-owned and evolving product strategy. Deliver advanced Data Science capabilities in a meaningful manner through successful proof-of-concept solutions, and later on, smoothly transition the proof-of-concept into production. Continuously contribute to the enablement, development, and deployment of ML-driven solutions to integrate within our applications, amplifying our capabilities, automate decision-making, and provide predictive intelligence. Contribute to the enablement the development and onboarding of Self-Service Machine Learning frameworks to scale ML capabilities Conduct evaluations and assessments of new tools and technologies to ensure that the team stays at the frontier of Analytics. Ability to communicate complex analytical concepts clearly and concisely both in written form and verbally to both technical and non-technical audiences, with a track record of strong partnerships with key stakeholders and clients across multiple functions Lead projects with hands-on analysis and modeling, drawing from multiple analytical methods to choose the right tool and right level of complexity appropriate for the business challenges Collect, analyze, and model available data to advance the customer analytics space and build a broad understanding of the Consumer Group’s customers and relevant customer segments. Pursue data quality, troubleshoot data validation, and see issues to resolution.', ' 5-7 years of experience working in web, product, customer, care, or other related analytics fields. Ability to tell stories with data, educate effectively, and instill confidence, motivating stakeholders to act on recommendations.', 'Overview']

Octo is today the Number 1 global provider of telematics and data analytics solutions for the auto insurance industry and, increasingly, a major player in Fleet management services, with world-class solutions to grow its core businesses –\xa0Insures\xa0and Intelligent Mobility – and to expand and provide innovative connected solutions in new industries and international markets. job_title: Staff Machine Learning Engineer – Personalized Listening Experiences
job_text: ['', 'Work closely with Product, User Research, Data Scientists, and other engineers to develop machine learning approaches that advance our mission to connect fans and artists', 'Improve the quality of Spotify’s personalized listening recommendations in playlists for our huge number of listeners, around the globe', 'Be an active contributor and technical leader to machine learning practitioners within Spotify', 'Rapidly prototype new ideas and productionize solutions at scale for our hundreds of millions of active users', 'You have built machine-learning based recommendation products that deliver measurable impact to 1M+ people', 'What You Will Do', 'Be accountable for algorithmic fairness and responsibility of playlist content recommendations systems', 'Identify opportunities for platformization and communicate requirements to platform teams', 'As part of the leadership team of a 50-person org, develop and help execute our long-term strategy and roadmap', 'You have a passion for delivering amazing user experiences', 'You have experience with data pipeline tools like Apache Beam, Scio, etc., ML tools like Kubeflow, and cloud platforms like GCP or peopleYou understand how requirements evolve over time and have made impactful improvements to ML products already in productionYou have hands-on experience implementing scalable systems in Java, software processes, data-driven development, reliability, and disciplined experimentationYou keep up with state of the art research by reading papers, attending conferences, and participating in research communities', 'You care about agile software processes, data-driven development, reliability, and disciplined experimentation', 'Strong passion for music', 'You are comfortable exploring data to deeply understand the problems and products you are working on', 'Multimedia (audio, image, and/or video) recommendation experience', 'Nice to have ', 'You keep up with state of the art research by active usersWork closely with Product, User Research, Data Scientists, and other engineers to develop machine learning approaches that advance our mission to connect fans and artistsBe an active ['', 'Desire to work in a collaborative environment focusing on continuous learning; participating in tech talks, code review, and pair programming.', "It's a bonus to have:", 'Machine Learning Engineer, Boston - Remote', 'Exposure to machine-learning model lifecycle; training, evaluation, serving.', 'Experience with any of: AWS, Airflow, Kubernetes, Terraform, Spark, Snowflake.Experience writing, testing, and interpreting numerical, scientific code.Experience with functional programming.Proficiency in SQL.', '1+ years of experience working as a professional software developer.Proficiency in Python with exposure to some subset of the Python ML ecosystem (numpy/scipy/pandas, Tensorflow, etc.).Exposure to machine-learning model lifecycle; training, evaluation, serving.Interest in deploying machine-learning models as scalable services.Interest in "tool-making"; building features for developers that empower them and make them faster.Passion for learning and growing as a developer.Desire to work in a collaborative environment focusing on continuous learning; participating in tech talks, code review, and pair programming.', 'ABOUT TEIKAMETRICS', 'Proficiency in Python with exposure to some subset of the Python ML ecosystem (numpy/scipy/pandas, Tensorflow, etc.).', 'Experience with any of: AWS, Airflow, Kubernetes, Terraform, Spark, Snowflake.', 'Qualified candidates should have:', "There has never been a more exciting time to join Teikametrics, the leading Retail Optimization Platform (ROP). We’re building an operating system to optimize every aspect of a retailer's business -- from advertising to inventory to pricing. We optimize billions of transactions for thousands of entrepreneurs and brands around the world selling on Amazon and other marketplaces. The Teikametrics ROP uses proprietary econometrics and machine-learning data models packaged in a simple SaaS interface. We combine our best in class technology with coaching and support from our world-class teams based in Boston, MA, Seattle, WA, and Bengaluru, India. We are looking for people who can excel, add value to our mission, and thrive in a demanding start-up environment.", 'Experience writing, testing, and interpreting numerical, scientific code.', 'Proficiency in SQL.', "Teikametrics is looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to join a team under the Data Science directorate tasked with building a platform that supports the rapid construction and deployment of prediction and control services in the domain of E-commerce. Candidates should have an understanding of machine learning and statistical modeling concepts paired with strong software engineering fundamentals. The Data Science team's predictive services are developed in Python on top of AWS Sagemaker, orchestrated by Airflow and backed by a data warehouse in Snowflake. Our back-end code emphasizes a ‘functional-first’ Scala stack with cats and fs2. The team's mandate is to design and build infrastructure that enables us to safely deploy solutions to the multi-agent, game-theoretic problems at the heart of decision-making in E-commerce. This entails model train/evaluate/serve lifecycle management, ML metadata storage and visibility, provisioning of separate environments for staging and integration testing, and task orchestration. The team will be adopting existing solutions, like Kubeflow or AWS Sagemaker, where appropriate and fill in the rest.", 'Interest in deploying machine-learning models as scalable services.', 'About the Role:', 'Interest in "tool-making"; building features for developers that empower them and make them faster.', '1+ years of experience working as a professional software developer.', 'Passion for learning and growing as a developer.', 'Experience with functional programming.', '\ufeff', '\xa0']

['', 'Location: Emeryville, CA // Remote: Temporarily due to COVID-19', 'The ideal candidate will have a background in Python, have experience working with large data sets, and have experience in building and deploying data-driven solutions. Have demonstrated success in using data science to develop and deploy solutions with a focus on impact.', "The Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning (AI / ML) Software Engineer will be responsible for supporting Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Data Science solutions.Looking for engineers with a passion for Artificial Intelligence to help drive a new generation of data and machine learning enabled services and products to impact healthcare.You will be working with a highly talented and diverse team of data scientists and engineers specializing in deep learning, active learning, and classical machine learning on one of the richest data sets in US healthcare. You'll be equipped with nearly limitless cloud compute resources and be expected to deliver business impact through implementation of a large pipeline of AI models.The ideal candidate will have a background in Python, have experience working with large data sets, and have experience in building and deploying data-driven solutions. Have demonstrated success in using data science to develop and deploy solutions with a focus on impact.", '• SQL design and development skills', 'Description:', 'Location: Emeryville, CA //', '• Experience working with and integrating services from popular ML packages such as Keras, TensorFlow, XGBoost, SciKit Learn', 'The Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning (AI / ML) Software Engineer will be responsible for supporting Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Data Science solutions.', 'Skills/Experience Needed:', '• Provide technical leadership and implementation for Software Engineering projects supporting our AI and machine learning goals', '• Above average capabilities with cloud computing techniques or tools such as S3, EC2, EMR, SageMaker, ECS, Lambda, IAM', '• Demonstrates strong drive to learn and advocate for development best practices (TDD, code reviews, continuous integration, etc.)', '• Experience building automated processes that are supportable, monitored, and enterprise-scale', "You will be working with a highly talented and diverse team of data scientists and engineers specializing in deep learning, active learning, and classical machine learning on one of the richest data sets in US healthcare. You'll be equipped with nearly limitless cloud compute resources and be expected to deliver business impact through implementation of a large pipeline of AI models.", 'Responsibilities:', '• Communicates with product stakeholders in a highly Agile environment', 'Looking for engineers with a passion for Artificial Intelligence to help drive a new generation of data and machine learning enabled services and products to impact healthcare.', '\xa0', 'Remote: Temporarily due to COVID-19', '2+ years’ experience working on applications of machine learning with strong to expert ability in Python as a primary language', 'Job Title: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning (AI / ML) Software Engineer', 'Duration: 5+ months ', '• Modifies, implements, tests, and supports all product related technology and functionality, including software infrastructure in an AWS hosted environment']

Bachelor or Masters Degree in a highly quantitative field (Computer Science, Machine Learning, Operational Research, Statistics, Mathematics, etc.) or equivalent experience\xa0', 'Work with the technical product manager team to review requirement and expected outcomes\xa0', 'The product platform organization is responsible for the overall fraud and abuse protection product strategy. The focus of the team is to define the product requirements, research the best way to defend against the threat vectors and architect the product to meet the following key requirements: Detection: Detect automated and human fraud / abuse through various methods with high accuracy. The detection must be tightly integrated with the challenge framework so as to adopt the most effective response strategy depending on the risk associated with the request session. The challenge framework is managed by Matt Ford’s Product Challenge organization. Visibility: provide a set of dashboard and reports to customers, partner and our support team to allow them to visualize and analyze the fraud activity detected by the product Serviceability: provide customers the ability tune the detection and response strategy based on the risk score. Also provide customers the ability to craft custom logic to meet their own requirements. The product platform consists of technical product managers and the product research team. The product research team is responsible for coming up with different ways to process data collected on a session in order to differentiate bot from human traffic but also detect human fraud within the human traffic. The team may use different techniques including but not limited to statistical model, unsupervised learning, supervised learning, deep learning, whichever model is the most effective to meet the accuracy requirements.', 'Experience working in the web security space is a plus (fraud, bot management, abuse, web application firewall)\xa0', 'Startup Experience', '3+ years of industry experience in predictive modeling, data science and analysis\xa0', 'Required Skills: Machine Learning, Data Science, Deep Learning, Data Modeling, HTTP, DNS, HTML, JavaScript, JS, CSS, Python, R, SQL', 'Company Description:', 'Nice to haves:', 'Research newer internet protocol that could provide additional signals that may be relevant to improve detection for example HTTP/2 or HTTP/3\xa0', 'Work with the Customer Success team to assist as needed with complex escalation, training on new detection methods and best practices for effectively defending against attacks\xa0', 'We also offer flexible PTO and some WFH opportunities as needed.', 'Follow evolution of privacy features introduced by browser vendors, assess possible impact for the product and propose necessary adjustment as needed.\xa0', 'Responsibilities:', 'Develop POC as needed and help draft the engineering design to be handed over to the dev team\xa0', 'Previous experience in a ML or data scientist role and a track record of building ML or DL models\xa0', 'Evaluate accuracy of detection methods and propose enhancements as needed\xa0', 'We are a fast-growing startup that is disrupting the fraud industry by putting the control back into the hands of digital businesses with an innovative approach that bankrupts the underlying business model of fraudsters. Our fraud and abuse prevention platform combines real-time intelligence, rich analytics and adaptive step-up challenges to progressively diminish the profitability of attacks while adapting to evolving attack patterns. We offer the only fraud solution with a 100% SLA guarantee. The world’s largest brands trust us to protect their customer journey while delivering unrivaled customer experience.', 'Occasional travel to customer site as necessary\xa0', 'Solid understanding of the world wide web ecosystem, including protocols (HTTP, DNS), coding (HTML, JS, CSS), issues around privacy…\xa0', 'Competitive salary, equity, and a robust benefits package includes top-notch medical, dental, vision, life insurance, 401k, commuter benefits and we cover 95% of the cost of employee benefits and 65% of the cost of dependent care coverage!\xa0We also offer flexible PTO and some WFH opportunities as needed.', 'Ability to adapt quickly and constructively to changes\xa0', "Example of this includes: user-agent deprecation and transition to client-hints Google privacy sandbox and privacy budget proposal, Safari's intelligent tracking prevention, Firefox enhanced tracking prevention\xa0", 'Proven track record of successful application of ML to resolve hard problems\xa0', 'Experience working in the web security space is a plus (fraud, bot management, abuse, web application firewall)\xa0Background in cybersecurity or fraud\xa0Startup Experience']

['', 'Demonstrated knowledge of network programming models. General understanding of multiple techniques and toolkits is needed.', 'SALARY RANGE: $103,200 - $163,200 (SS III)', 'Ability to traverse across various locations on the laboratory site and access work areas\xa0Ability to work at a computer workstation for extended periods\xa0Visual capabilities to use computer workstations, read documents, and see safety alarms\xa0', 'Lead and assist in the design and development of data transport and related systems to support the 12 GeV program , EIC design work, and future science programs.', 'Ability to understand complex problems and to collaborate, explore and implement alternative solutions\xa0', 'Jefferson Lab seeks a new team member at the level of a Staff Computer Scientist III for the Experimental Physics Software and Computing Infrastructure (EPSCI) group in the Computational Science and Technology (CST) division. As a member of EPSCI, the candidate will help develop systems utilizing the latest software, computing, and networking technologies to help advance the scientific program of the lab. We are seeking excellent candidates with knowledge/experience in streaming data transport to design and implement systems to meet the challenges of future scientific experiments to match computational resources to their larger size and scope. These include the 12GeV Experimental Nuclear Physics program currently underway and future science programs under development. The successful candidate will focus on research activities and developing data transport tools for streaming readout data acquisition systems as well as post-acquisition data processing. Duties will include working with scientists at Jefferson Lab and partner institutions to develop such tools and provide expert advice on their implementation. Applicants must be able to work with a small group of subject matter experts, have good communication skills, and relevant technical knowledge.', 'Strong background in Linear Algebra, Probability and Statistics, Data Structure and Algorithms. Proficient in Python and C/C++.', 'Demonstrated knowledge of network programming models. General understanding of multiple techniques and toolkits is needed.Strong background in Linear Algebra, Probability and Statistics, Data Structure and Algorithms. Proficient in Python and C/C++.Must possess good written and oral communication skills.Must be able to operate computer equipment in an office or laboratory environment.', 'Plan, coordinate, and complete large projects.\xa0Learn the scientific requirements for the 12 GeV program, including experimental applications with an emphasis on data acquisition transport technologies.Lead and assist in the design and development of data transport and related systems to support the 12 GeV program , EIC design work, and future science programs.Collaborate with universities and other DOE Labs to advance and support the scientific program at Jefferson Lab.Experience in HTC preferred.\xa0Proficiency in C/C++, Java, and Python are a plus.', 'Ability to work at a computer workstation for extended periods\xa0', 'Education and Experience:', 'Knowledge, Skills, Abilities:', 'Physical Requirements', 'Jefferson Science Associates, LLC (JSA) manages and operates the Thomas Jefferson National Accelerator Facility (Jefferson Lab). JSA is an Equal Opportunity Employer and does not discriminate in hiring or employment on the basis of race, color, religion, ethnicity, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, ancestry, age, disability, or veteran status or on any other basis prohibited by federal, state, or local law. As part of the JSA’s equal employment opportunity policy, we also take affirmative action as called for by applicable laws and Executive Orders to ensure that minority group individuals, females, disabled veterans, recently separated veterans, other protected veterans, Armed Forces, and qualified disabled persons are introduced into our workforce and considered for promotional opportunities.', 'Capable of analytic and deductive reasoning\xa0', 'Experience in HTC preferred.\xa0Proficiency in C/C++, Java, and Python are a plus.', 'Employment with JSA is conditional upon DOE approval if at any time during your employment you are participating in a Foreign Government Talent Recruitment Program. Generally, such programs include any foreign-state-sponsored attempt to acquire U.S.-funded scientific research through programs run or funded by the government that target scientists, engineers, academics, researchers, and entrepreneurs of all nationalities working or educated in the United States.', 'Mental Requirements', 'We are currently seeking a Streaming Data Scientist..\xa0', 'Collaborate with universities and other DOE Labs to advance and support the scientific program at Jefferson Lab.', 'Must possess good written and oral communication skills.', 'Ability to traverse across various locations on the laboratory site and access work areas\xa0', 'Position Requirements', 'Visual capabilities to use computer workstations, read documents, and see safety alarms\xa0', "You 'Matter to Us'\xa0Our diverse team at Jefferson Lab includes more than 700 people, comprising physicists, engineers, computer professionals, technicians and more. From probing the basic building blocks of matter to performing advanced computing and applied research, we are on the leading edge of science and technology. If you are looking for a great job in a unique place where your contributions truly matter, consider Jefferson Lab!", '\xa0', 'Ph.D. in Computer Science or Physical Sciences plus 10 years of relevant experience', 'Must be able to operate computer equipment in an office or laboratory environment.', 'Ability to understand, remember, and communicate highly technical information and make decisions\xa0', 'Ability to understand, remember, and communicate highly technical information and make decisions\xa0Ability to understand complex problems and to collaborate, explore and implement alternative solutions\xa0Capable of analytic and deductive reasoning\xa0', 'POSITION POSTED: AUGUST 11, 2020', 'Essential Job Functions:\xa0', 'Plan, coordinate, and complete large projects.', '\xa0Learn the scientific requirements for the 12 GeV program, including experimental applications with an emphasis on data acquisition transport technologies.']

['', 'Collaborate cross-functionally with engineers, product managers, and data teams to deliver strategies that impact Ro’s business and platforms', 'As one of your most senior Data Scientists on the team, you’ll be owning and leading projects from start to finish, working closely with internal teams (both data and non-data savvy) to deliver optimized, scalable solutions. We are looking for someone who is motivated to strive for analytical excellence, working on unique high impact problems from teams across Ro’s business. We’re patients, just like you, building technology to make healthcare accessible, affordable, and maybe even enjoyable. Ro powers three digital health clinics -- Roman for men’s health, Rory for women’s health, and Zero for fighting smoking addiction -- as well as Ro Pharmacy, a simple and affordable online pharmacy where every medication is $5 per month. The company’s nationwide networking of physicians and pharmacies provides a personalized, end-to-end healthcare experience from online treatment to the delivery of medication and ongoing care. Ro was named #2 in Wellness on Fast Company’s 2019 list of the World’s Most Innovative Companies, and listed by Inc. ['', 'Demonstrated knowledge of network programming models. General understanding of multiple techniques and toolkits is needed.', 'SALARY RANGE: $103,200 - $163,200 (SS III)', 'Ability to traverse across various locations on the laboratory site and access work areas\xa0Ability to work at a computer workstation for extended periods\xa0Visual capabilities to use computer workstations, read documents, and see safety alarms\xa0', 'Lead and assist in the design and development of data transport and related systems to support the 12 GeV program , EIC design work, and future science programs.', 'Ability to understand complex problems and to collaborate, explore and implement alternative solutions\xa0', 'Jefferson Lab seeks a new team member at the level of a Staff Computer Scientist III for the Experimental Physics Software and Computing Infrastructure (EPSCI) group in the Computational Science and Technology (CST) division. As a member of EPSCI, the candidate will help develop systems utilizing the latest software, computing, and networking technologies to help advance the scientific program of the lab. We are seeking excellent candidates with knowledge/experience in streaming data transport to design and implement systems to meet the challenges of future scientific experiments to match computational resources to their larger size and scope. These include the 12GeV Experimental Nuclear Physics program currently underway and future science programs under development. The successful candidate will focus on research activities and developing data transport tools for streaming readout data acquisition systems as well as post-acquisition data processing. Duties will include working with scientists at Jefferson Lab and partner institutions to develop such tools and provide expert advice on their implementation. Applicants must be able to work with a small group of subject matter experts, have good communication skills, and relevant technical knowledge.', 'Strong background in Linear Algebra, Probability and Statistics, Data Structure and Algorithms. Proficient in Python and C/C++.', 'Demonstrated knowledge of network programming models. General understanding of multiple techniques and toolkits is needed.Strong background in Linear Algebra, Probability and Statistics, Data Structure and Algorithms. Proficient in Python and C/C++.Must possess good written and oral communication skills.Must be able to operate computer equipment in an office or laboratory environment.', 'Plan, coordinate, and complete large projects.\xa0Learn the scientific requirements for the 12 GeV program, including experimental applications with an emphasis on data acquisition transport technologies.Lead and assist in the design and development of data transport and related systems to support the 12 GeV program , EIC design work, and future science programs.Collaborate with universities and other DOE Labs to advance and support the scientific program at Jefferson Lab.Experience in HTC preferred.\xa0Proficiency in C/C++, Java, and Python are a plus.', 'Ability to work at a computer workstation for extended periods\xa0', 'Education and Experience:', 'Knowledge, Skills, Abilities:', 'Physical Requirements', 'Jefferson Science Associates, LLC (JSA) manages and operates the Thomas Jefferson National Accelerator Facility (Jefferson Lab). JSA is an Equal Opportunity Employer and does not discriminate in hiring or employment on the basis of race, color, religion, ethnicity, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, ancestry, age, disability, or veteran status or on any other basis prohibited by federal, state, or local law. As part of the JSA’s equal employment opportunity policy, we also take affirmative action as called for by applicable laws and Executive Orders to ensure that minority group individuals, females, disabled veterans, recently separated veterans, other protected veterans, Armed Forces, and qualified disabled persons are introduced into our workforce and considered for promotional opportunities.', 'Capable of analytic and deductive reasoning\xa0', 'Experience in HTC preferred.\xa0Proficiency in C/C++, Java, and Python are a plus.', 'Employment with JSA is conditional upon DOE approval if at any time during your employment you are participating in a Foreign Government Talent Recruitment Program. Generally, such programs include any foreign-state-sponsored attempt to acquire U.S.-funded scientific research through programs run or funded by the government that target scientists, engineers, academics, researchers, and entrepreneurs of all nationalities working or educated in the United States.', 'Mental Requirements', 'We are currently seeking a Streaming Data Scientist..\xa0', 'Collaborate with universities and other DOE Labs to advance and support the scientific program at Jefferson Lab.', 'Must possess good written and oral communication skills.', 'Ability to traverse across various locations on the laboratory site and access work areas\xa0', 'Position Requirements', 'Visual capabilities to use computer workstations, read documents, and see safety alarms\xa0', "You 'Matter to Us'\xa0Our diverse team at Jefferson Lab includes more than 700 people, comprising physicists, engineers, computer professionals, technicians and more. From probing the basic building blocks of matter to performing advanced computing and applied research, we are on the leading edge of science and technology. If you are looking for a great job in a unique place where your contributions truly matter, consider Jefferson Lab!", '\xa0', 'Ph.D. in Computer Science or Physical Sciences plus 10 years of relevant experience', 'Must be able to operate computer equipment in an office or laboratory environment.', 'Ability to understand, remember, and communicate highly technical information and make decisions\xa0', 'Ability to understand, remember, and communicate highly technical information and make decisions\xa0Ability to understand complex problems and to collaborate, explore and implement alternative solutions\xa0Capable of analytic and deductive reasoning\xa0', 'POSITION POSTED: AUGUST 11, 2020', 'Essential Job Functions:\xa0', 'Plan, coordinate, and complete large projects.', '\xa0Learn the scientific requirements for the 12 GeV program, including experimental applications with an emphasis on data acquisition transport technologies.']

job_title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer- Data Automation
job_text: ['', ' Apply advanced NLP techniques for multi-entity disambiguation and reinforcement learning to replace heuristic-based decision tree', ' Direct ML strategy for the team and work closely with the ML platform team, ETL infrastructure team as well as guide truth-gathering efforts', ' Professional experience of building and deploying ML apps to production', ' Learn cutting-edge research in advanced ML & NLP topics and devise an efficient application for projects Direct ML strategy for the team and work closely with the ML platform team, ETL infrastructure team as well as guide truth-gathering efforts Drive, design & develop projects as the principal point-of-contact, with the ability to determine suitable ML models, direct feature engineering processes and negotiate KPIs per business needs Participate in technical conferences, publish papers and evaluate new technologies', ' A strong statistical background in ML, NLP, deep learning models along with familiarity in probabilistic information retrieval and optimization methods', ' Learn cutting-edge research in advanced ML & NLP topics and devise an efficient application for projects', 'Bloomberg is an equal opportunities employer, and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', ' Employ weakly supervised learning approaches for understanding structural associations embedded in various document layouts', ' Familiarity with SQL and NoSQL data modeling and exploratory data visualization', ' Replace our traditional annotation models with modern BERT/ELMO language models Employ weakly supervised learning approaches for understanding structural associations embedded in various document layouts Apply advanced NLP techniques for multi-entity disambiguation and reinforcement learning to replace heuristic-based decision tree', ' Authored research publications, participation in ML competitions, working demos/repos', ' Participate in technical conferences, publish papers and evaluate new technologies', "On the Data Automation team, we develop machine learning models and infrastructure to extract key information from all kinds of financial documents such as analyst recommendations, corporate/municipal bond offerings, earnings releases. Our team has built some of the world's most sophisticated neural networks that have beaten the performance of even the best analysts in the market – often demanding 99.9% precision. The models we build enable our clients to get accurate answers fast. The work we do is essential, as a single prediction error can have a market moving effect.", ' Knowledge of advanced concepts such as weakly supervised learning, reinforcement learning and active learning', ' A solid understanding of data structures, algorithms and software design concepts', ' Drive, design & develop projects as the principal point-of-contact, with the ability to determine suitable ML models, direct feature engineering processes and negotiate KPIs per business needs', 'As part of our team, you will own the research on cutting-edge ML/NLP techniques and design efforts for the most efficient and practical application of those techniques to sophisticated business problems. You will utilize our automated ML suite, equipped with annotation platforms, for collecting training data and hyper-tuning models, as well as deploy your application on our scalable ETL infrastructure. If the idea of applying technology and information retrieval techniques to solve challenging data problems excites you, keep reading.', ' Knowledge of advanced concepts such as weakly supervised learning, reinforcement learning and active learning Familiarity with SQL and NoSQL data modeling and exploratory data visualization Authored research publications, participation in ML competitions, working demos/repos', ' Strong communication skills and interest in learning financial product domains', ' BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Data Science or related technology field', ' Replace our traditional annotation models with modern BERT/ELMO language models', ' A strong statistical background in ML, NLP, deep learning models along with familiarity in probabilistic information retrieval and optimization methods Professional experience of building and deploying ML apps to production 2+ years of hands-on experience in Python/C/C++ development and knowledge of distributed, scalable architectures and CICD tooling A solid understanding of data structures, algorithms and software design concepts Strong communication skills and interest in learning financial product domains BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Data Science or related technology field', ' 2+ years of hands-on experience in Python/C/C++ development and knowledge of distributed, scalable architectures and CICD tooling', 'You will also collaborate with financial domain specialists to gain valuable insights and use their business expertise to increase accuracy in annotating training data. A right combination of cross-field ML techniques, deep understanding of the business problem and high quality training data is fundamental to our models beating the precision of most academic and industry standards and presents a phenomenal opportunity! If this sounds like a challenge you are up for, please apply below.']

Some of the types of projects you will work on:', 'Experience with MapReduce, Spark and Hive on large datasets.', 'Ability to go deep and build the most impactful solutions while also leading multiple directions across multiple teams and organizations to ensure the success of our mission.', 'Supercharge Uber’s rides and eats subscription upsells, target benefits incentives based on user interest and product usage, and impact Uber’s business goals by improving acquisition and engagement.', 'Proven track record to choose the right ML solutions to solve the problem within current constraints while having a clear vision of the next iterations and a good balance between exploration and exploitation of different techniques.', 'Passion to use machine learning to empower Uber products.', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Role initiatlly posted with incorrect required years of experience:Basic Qualifications changed from 5+ years of required experience to 7+ yearsPreferred Qualification changed from 3+ years of experience to 5+ years']

['', 'Our Requirements', 'Ability to own your modeling work from model development all the way to production deployment and beyond with minimal help from engineers', ' A Bachelor’s/Master’s degree (or higher) in a technical field (Computer Science, Statistics, Economics, Operations Research, Math, Physics, Engineering, etc.) or equivalent work experience required. minimum of 3+ years of professional experience in Data Science or Applied Machine Learning required A deep theoretical understanding of modern machine learning algorithms, statistical models, or optimization Extensive experience with data tools, Python (Pandas, Scipy, Numpy, Scikit-Learn, etc), R, SAS, SQL, etc and strong skills in data analysis, data visualization, and feature engineering Ability to own your modeling work from model development all the way to production deployment and beyond with minimal help from engineers Strong communication skills; Explaining complex technical concepts to product managers, data analysts, and other engineers shouldn’t be a problem for you', 'Modeling and forecasting demand and supply to enable more intelligent matching, optimize the overall marketplace efficiency and provide valuable insights to our merchants and Postmates', 'Your Responsibilities', ' Modeling and forecasting demand and supply to enable more intelligent matching, optimize the overall marketplace efficiency and provide valuable insights to our merchants and Postmates Large scale Machine Learning algorithms that powers our Search Ranking models and Personalized Recommendation Engine Predicting the Postmates Delivery Time (PDT) and improving the dispatching algorithm Determining the optimal pricing strategies to help our Postmates maximize their revenue Identifying suspicious transactions and malicious users for risk control Natural Language Processing to understand text content on Postmates platform, including named entity resolution and recognization of reviews, descriptions and interactions between users on our marketplace ', 'minimum of 3+ years of professional experience in Data Science or Applied Machine Learning required', 'Experience with MapReduce, Spark, Hive, HBase, Google BigQuery, and BigTable', 'Determining the optimal pricing strategies to help our Postmates maximize their revenue', 'A Bachelor’s/Master’s degree (or higher) in a technical field (Computer Science, Statistics, Economics, Operations Research, Math, Physics, Engineering, etc.) or equivalent work experience required.']

['', 'Desire to work in a collaborative environment focusing on continuous learning; participating in tech talks, code review, and pair programming.', "It's a bonus to have:", 'Machine Learning Engineer, Boston - Remote', 'Exposure to machine-learning model lifecycle; training, evaluation, serving.', 'Experience with any of: AWS, Airflow, Kubernetes, Terraform, Spark, Snowflake.Experience writing, testing, and interpreting numerical, scientific code.Experience with functional programming.Proficiency in SQL.', '1+ years of experience working as a professional software developer.Proficiency in Python with exposure to some subset of the Python ML ecosystem (numpy/scipy/pandas, Tensorflow, etc.).Exposure to machine-learning model lifecycle; training, evaluation, serving.Interest in deploying machine-learning models as scalable services.Interest in "tool-making"; building features for developers that empower them and make them faster.Passion for learning and growing as a developer.Desire to work in a collaborative environment focusing on continuous learning; participating in tech talks, code review, and pair programming.', 'ABOUT TEIKAMETRICS', 'Proficiency in Python with exposure to some subset of the Python ML ecosystem (numpy/scipy/pandas, Tensorflow, etc.).', 'Experience with any of: AWS, Airflow, Kubernetes, Terraform, Spark, Snowflake.', 'Qualified candidates should have:', "There has never been a more exciting time to join Teikametrics, the leading Retail Optimization Platform (ROP). We’re building an operating system to optimize every aspect of a retailer's business -- from advertising to inventory to pricing. We optimize billions of transactions for thousands of entrepreneurs and brands around the world selling on Amazon and other marketplaces. The Teikametrics ROP uses proprietary econometrics and machine-learning data models packaged in a simple SaaS interface. We combine our best in class technology with coaching and support from our world-class teams based in Boston, MA, Seattle, WA, and Bengaluru, India. We are looking for people who can excel, add value to our mission, and thrive in a demanding start-up environment.", 'Experience writing, testing, and interpreting numerical, scientific code.', 'Proficiency in SQL.', "Teikametrics is looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to join a team under the Data Science directorate tasked with building a platform that supports the rapid construction and deployment of prediction and control services in the domain of E-commerce. Candidates should have an understanding of machine learning and statistical modeling concepts paired with strong software engineering fundamentals. The Data Science team's predictive services are developed in Python on top of AWS Sagemaker, orchestrated by Airflow and backed by a data warehouse in Snowflake. Our back-end code emphasizes a ‘functional-first’ Scala stack with cats and fs2. The team's mandate is to design and build infrastructure that enables us to safely deploy solutions to the multi-agent, game-theoretic problems at the heart of decision-making in E-commerce. This entails model train/evaluate/serve lifecycle management, ML metadata storage and visibility, provisioning of separate environments for staging and integration testing, and task orchestration. The team will be adopting existing solutions, like Kubeflow or AWS Sagemaker, where appropriate and fill in the rest.", 'Interest in deploying machine-learning models as scalable services.', 'About the Role:', 'Interest in "tool-making"; building features for developers that empower them and make them faster.', '1+ years of experience working as a professional software developer.', 'Passion for learning and growing as a developer.', 'Experience with functional programming.', '\ufeff', '\xa0']

['', 'Requirements:', 'Excellent understanding of experimental design and statistics.', 'Solid understanding in Python', 'Job ID: 346176', 'Very good verbal, written communication, and technical presentation skills.', 'About Eliassen Group:', 'Master’s degree or above in a quantitative field, e.g., statistics, mathematics, physics, computer science, economics, engineering.Excellent understanding of experimental design and statistics.Hands-on experience in defining best practices around experimentation and running advanced analyticsExcellent logical, analytical and conceptual skills.Strong data-driven decision makingVery good verbal, written communication, and technical presentation skills.Ambitious, self-starter attitude; able to adapt to emerging challenges and execute under ambiguity.Knowledge of SQL is required.Solid understanding in Python', 'Don’t miss out on our referral program! If we hire a candidate that you refer us to then you can be eligible for a\xa0$1,000 referral check!', 'Ambitious, self-starter attitude; able to adapt to emerging challenges and execute under ambiguity.', 'Excellent logical, analytical and conceptual skills.', 'We have an exciting opportunity for a Data\xa0Scientist\xa0with our industry-leading client in San Jose, CA.', '\xa0$1,000 referral check!', 'Knowledge of SQL is required.', 'Hands-on experience in defining best practices around experimentation and running advanced analytics', 'This role is part of the Experimentation Platform team within Global Marketing TechPartner with various teams within the client’s marketing org\xa0\xa0Use scientific insights to help drive the strategic direction of experimentation within the orgHelp define standard measurement methodologies and build advanced statistical tools into the platform to improve various aspects of experiment lifecycle to drive quality insights', 'Use scientific insights to help drive the strategic direction of experimentation within the org', 'We will accept corp to corp or w2 contractors. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, protected veteran status, or disability status.', 'Eliassen Group provides strategic talent solutions to drive our clients’ innovation and business results. For more information, visit http://www.eliassen.com.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Help define standard measurement methodologies and build advanced statistical tools into the platform to improve various aspects of experiment lifecycle to drive quality insights', 'Partner with various teams within the client’s marketing org\xa0\xa0', 'Strong data-driven decision making', 'Master’s degree or above in a quantitative field, e.g., statistics, mathematics, physics, computer science, economics, engineering.', 'This role is part of the Experimentation Platform team within Global Marketing Tech']

job_title: Staff Machine Learning Engineer – Personalized Listening Experiences
job_text: ['', 'Work closely with Product, User Research, Data Scientists, and other engineers to develop machine learning approaches that advance our mission to connect fans and artists', 'Improve products that deliver measurable impact to 1M+ people', 'What You Will Do', 'Be accountable for algorithmic fairness and responsibility of playlist content recommendations systems', 'Identify ['', 'Experience working with a user-facing product team', 'Description of the most interesting data analysis you’ve done, key findings, and its impact.', 'We’re Looking For Someone With', 'You Should Include These In Your Application', 'Create analyses that tell a “story” focused on insights, not just data.', ' Work closely with product and business teams to identify important questions and answer them with data. Apply statistical and econometric models on large datasets to: i) measure results and outcomes, ii) identify causal impact and attribution, iii) predict future performance of users or products. ['', 'About Us:\xa0', 'Work cross-functionally with R&D and software teams to develop and productionize novel methods.', 'Ph.D. or equivalent in genomics, bioinformatics, data science, statistics, or a related field, with a strong publication record.Experience in designing algorithms to analyze NGS data.Fluency in C, C++, Perl, Python, and/or R.Experience in professional software development is a plus. Experience in cancer research is a plus.Ability and desire to work in a fast-paced, dynamic startup environment.', 'Ph.D. or equivalent in genomics, bioinformatics, data science, statistics, or a related field, with a strong publication record.', 'Qualifications and Skills:', 'Role and Responsibilities:', 'Resolution Bioscience was founded in 2012 and is privately held. We specialize in non-invasive liquid biopsy genomic analysis of tumors in patients afflicted with cancer. Our CLIA lab supports the application of our technologies in clinical trials for major pharmaceutical companies and in research projects with leading researchers and institutions globally. We have serious fun doing work that matters. Resolution Bioscience is an EEO employer. Salary DOE with a competitive benefit offering.', 'Resolution Bioscience is an EEO employer. Salary DOE with a competitive benefit offering.', 'Design algorithms to detect cancer mutations with high sensitivity and specificity, using data from our proprietary targeted sequencing platform.', 'Fluency in C, C++, Perl, Python, and/or R.', 'Design algorithms to detect cancer mutations with high sensitivity and specificity, using data from our proprietary targeted sequencing platform.Work cross-functionally with R&D and software teams to develop and productionize novel methods.Develop QC metrics and optimize the design and performance of our platform.', 'Computational Biologist / Data Scientist', 'Experience in designing algorithms to analyze NGS data.', '\xa0\xa0', 'Experience in professional software development is a plus. Experience in cancer research is a plus.', 'Ability and desire to work in a fast-paced, dynamic startup environment.', 'Develop QC metrics and optimize the design and performance of our platform.', 'Resolution Bioscience is seeking a Computational Biologist / Data Scientist who will help create and implement novel software tools for analyzing circulating tumor DNA (ctDNA) from cancer patients.\xa0Resolution Bioscience is a global leader in the development of noninvasive liquid biopsy technologies and companion diagnostics. We create innovative tests that transition rapidly from development to clinical implementation. Our team is serious about improving the quality of cancer patient care in a science-first, collegial atmosphere.']

['', '- Design and build innovative approaches to protect users from fraud scenarios (such as account takeover, spammy behaviors) and reduce risk with state-of-art ML technologies.', '- Create new features, train new models, and build end-to-end real-time production systems on anomaly detection, predictive modeling, classification, and optimization.', "Our Security team is missioned to build infrastructures, platforms, and technologies, as well as to support cross-functional teams to protect our users, products, and infrastructures. In this team, you'll have a unique opportunity to have first-hand exposure to the strategy of the company in key security initiatives, especially in building scalable and secure-by-design systems and solutions.  Our challenges are not your regular day-to-day technical problems; you'll be part of a team that's developing new solutions to new challenges of a kind not previously addressed by big tech.  It's working fast, at scale, and we're making a difference.  ", '- BS degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or other relevant majors with 2+ year of work experience ', '- Extend and improve ML frameworks and platforms, creating next-generation capabilities for detecting the emerging threat in fraud and risk-related scenarios.', '- Solid technical / data-mining skills and ability to work with large volume data to detect and identify abusive actions in our products', '- Strong working knowledge of machine learning algorithms including classifiers, clustering algorithms, and anomaly detection', 'TikTok is committed to providing reasonable accommodations during our recruitment process. If you need assistance or accommodation, please reach out to us at USRC@tiktok.com.', 'Qualifications: ', '- Ability to think critically and to formulate solutions to problems in a clear, concise, and timely manner', 'TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Mumbai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo. ', 'Responsibilities:', "TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too."]

['', 'About Us:\xa0', 'Work cross-functionally with R&D and software teams to develop and productionize novel methods.', 'Ph.D. or equivalent in genomics, bioinformatics, data science, statistics, or a related field, with a strong publication record.Experience in designing algorithms to analyze NGS data.Fluency in C, C++, Perl, Python, and/or R.Experience in professional software development is a plus. Experience in cancer research is a plus.Ability and desire to work in a fast-paced, dynamic startup environment.', 'Ph.D. or equivalent in genomics, bioinformatics, data science, statistics, or a related field, with a strong publication record.', 'Qualifications and Skills:', 'Role and Responsibilities:', 'Resolution Bioscience was founded in 2012 and is privately held. We specialize in non-invasive liquid biopsy genomic analysis of tumors in patients afflicted with cancer. Our CLIA lab supports the application of our technologies in clinical trials for major pharmaceutical companies and in research projects with leading researchers and institutions globally. We have serious fun doing work that matters. Resolution Bioscience is an EEO employer. Salary DOE with a competitive benefit offering.', 'Resolution Bioscience is an EEO employer. Salary DOE with a competitive benefit offering.', 'Design algorithms to detect cancer mutations with high sensitivity and specificity, using data from our proprietary targeted sequencing platform.', 'Fluency in C, C++, Perl, Python, and/or R.', 'Design algorithms to detect cancer mutations with high sensitivity and specificity, using data from our proprietary targeted sequencing platform.Work cross-functionally with R&D and software teams to develop and productionize novel methods.Develop QC metrics and optimize the design and performance of our platform.', 'Computational Biologist / Data Scientist', 'Experience in designing algorithms to analyze NGS data.', '\xa0\xa0', 'Experience in professional software development is a plus. Experience in cancer research is a plus.', 'Ability and desire to work in a fast-paced, dynamic startup environment.', 'Develop QC metrics and optimize the design and performance of our platform.', 'Resolution Bioscience is seeking a Computational Biologist / Data Scientist who will help create and implement novel software tools for analyzing circulating tumor DNA (ctDNA) from cancer patients.\xa0Resolution Bioscience is a global leader in the development of noninvasive liquid biopsy technologies and companion diagnostics. We create innovative tests that transition rapidly from development to clinical implementation. Our team is serious about improving the quality of cancer patient care in a science-first, collegial atmosphere.']

job_title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer II - Rider Pricing - Marketplace
job_text: ['', "What You'll Do", '5 Minimum Years of industry experience with a PhD in relevant fields (CS, EE, Math, Stats, Physics, etc.) or 7 Minimum Years of industry experience with a master or bachelor degree.2 Minimum Years on Machine Learning, Statistics, Optimization and Data Mining.Expertise in one or more object-oriented languages, including C++, Java, Python, Go or Scala.', 'Lead the machine learning effort in pricing and incentives', 'Expertise in one or more object-oriented languages, including C++, Java, Python, Go or Scala.', '5 Minimum Years of industry experience with a PhD in relevant fields (CS, EE, Math, Stats, Physics, etc.) or 7 Minimum Years of industry experience with a master or bachelor degree.', 'Experience presenting at industry recognized ML conferences and a good publishing record.', 'Experience in simplifying/converting business problems into ML problems.', 'Experience developing complex software systems scaling to millions of users with production quality deployment, monitoring and reliability.', '2 Minimum Years on Machine Learning, Statistics, Optimization and Data Mining.', 'Drive open-ended projects from end to end, with exceptional execution.', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Collaborate with Product Managers and Data Scientists closely.', 'Experience in simplifying/converting business problems into ML problems.Experience developing complex software systems scaling to millions of users with production quality deployment, monitoring and reliability.Experience presenting at industry recognized ML conferences and a good publishing record.', 'Lead the machine learning effort in pricing and incentivesDrive open-ended projects from end to end, with exceptional execution.Thrive in ambiguous product requirements.Collaborate with Product Managers and Data Scientists closely.Make data driven decisions.Be motivated to own projects and push them forward with independence. Most importantly, have a passion to make Uber better for our ride.', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Be motivated to own projects and push them forward with independence. Most importantly, have a passion to make Uber better for our ride.', 'Thrive in ambiguous product requirements.', 'Make data driven decisions.']

['', ' Is comfortable working with teams, sharing code among peers, and presenting to leadership.', ' Analyze data and build predictive and prescriptive models in a wide range of areas including customer segmentation and lifetime, business performance, customer clustering, capacity planning, asset profitablity, cost management, and various other areas.', 'The Main Responsibilities', 'The Role', ' Strong communication skills and relationship skills.', ' Ability to write customized algorithms to drive predictive and prescriptive analysis in business management, creating actionable recommendations to improve Financial Decisions.', ' Python and/or R data script writing.', ' Analyze data and build predictive and prescriptive models in a wide range of areas including customer segmentation and lifetime, business performance, customer clustering, capacity planning, asset profitablity, cost management, and various other areas. Mine information for previously unknown patterns and insights hidden in these assets and leverage them for competitive advantage. The problems solved will be at the cutting edge of technology and will lie at the intersection of science, engineering, and business acumen. Be part of a highly skilled agile team and within the Consumer Finance team.', 'EEO Statement', ' Experience with SQL, database navigation in an Oracle data environment and Data Lake unstructured environments.', ' Experience with SQL, database navigation in an Oracle data environment and Data Lake unstructured environments. Python and/or R data script writing. Very strong in math and statistics at the post graduate level. Masters in a mathematical and modeling discipline a must, PHD preferred. Experienced in writing formulas, expressions and algorithms as needed to support analytical work. Understands how to explore unstructured data to gain insights and build models to produce results. Strong communication skills and relationship skills.', ' Mine information for previously unknown patterns and insights hidden in these assets and leverage them for competitive advantage.', ' Has a genuine drive to succeed and self-motivated to take care of business , while positively representing the team.', 'Qualifications', ' Ability to perform ad-hoc statistical analysis including correlation analysis, frequency distribution analysis, probabilistic modeling, sophisticated forecasting, and academic based predictive and prescriptive methods.', ' Ability to perform ad-hoc statistical analysis including correlation analysis, frequency distribution analysis, probabilistic modeling, sophisticated forecasting, and academic based predictive and prescriptive methods. Capable of modeling the relationships between many sources of raw data, develop models that can serve to provide insight to support decision making and guide financial decisions. Ability to write customized algorithms to drive predictive and prescriptive analysis in business management, creating actionable recommendations to improve Financial Decisions. Can be flexible to work on various types of projects, often balancing multiple deliverables with a wide range of complexity requirements. Is comfortable working with teams, sharing code among peers, and presenting to leadership. Has a genuine drive to succeed and self-motivated to take care of business , while positively representing the team.', 'What To Expect Next', ' Can be flexible to work on various types of projects, often balancing multiple deliverables with a wide range of complexity requirements.', 'About Lumen', ' The problems solved will be at the cutting edge of technology and will lie at the intersection of science, engineering, and business acumen.', 'Disclaimer', ' Masters in a mathematical and modeling discipline a must, PHD preferred.', ' Understands how to explore unstructured data to gain insights and build models to produce results.', ' Capable of modeling the relationships between many sources of raw data, develop models that can serve to provide insight to support decision making and guide financial decisions.', 'What We Look For in a Candidate', ' Very strong in math and statistics at the post graduate level.', ' Be part of a highly skilled agile team and within the Consumer Finance team.', ' Experienced in writing formulas, expressions and algorithms as needed to support analytical work.']

['', 'Machine Learning Engineer\xa0', 'The ideal Machine Learning Engineer will have 2-5 years of experience, knowledge of Java and Python and be very familiar with basic data structures and at least one machine-learning library. Object-oriented programming, functional programming and familiarity with cloud tools is preferred!', 'Atlanta, Georgia\xa0', '\xa0', 'An experienced Machine Learning Engineer with a passion for coding and developing applications! You will be joining a very dynamic team that stays on the cutting edge of new tools and technologies to optimize engineer productivity including Solr, Fusion, BigData – Spark, DataFlow, Hadoop, Google Cloud – PaaS, IaaS and SaaS, Java, Scala, Python and Go!\xa0', 'You will be responsible for determining the most relevant products for a given custom question from a catalog of millions of products. You will engage machine techniques in several internal groups within the search team. It is imperative that you have the experience understanding customer questions, being able to enrich the product catalog and sort through the products efficiently and effectively.\xa0', 'How will you make an impact?\xa0', 'Invent novel ways to improve search experiences', 'What are we looking for?\xa0', 'Conduct experiments related to state-of-the-art information retrieval (IR) techniques relevant for the retail domain', 'Maintain/improve customer facing cloud native applications\xa0', 'Conduct experiments related to state-of-the-art information retrieval (IR) techniques relevant for the retail domainContinually deploy successful methods to enhance the overall search experience of the customers\xa0Invent novel ways to improve search experiencesMaintain/improve customer facing cloud native applications\xa0', 'Contract to Hire Opportunity\xa0', 'Continually deploy successful methods to enhance the overall search experience of the customers\xa0']
