['', '- Design and build innovative approaches to protect users from fraud scenarios (such as account takeover, spammy behaviors) and reduce risk with state-of-art ML technologies.', '- Create new features, train new models, and build end-to-end real-time production systems on anomaly detection, predictive modeling, classification, and optimization.', "Our Security team is missioned to build infrastructures, platforms, and technologies, as well as to support cross-functional teams to protect our users, products, and infrastructures. In this team, you'll have a unique opportunity to have first-hand exposure to the strategy of the company in key security initiatives, especially in building scalable and secure-by-design systems and solutions.  Our challenges are not your regular day-to-day technical problems; you'll be part of a team that's developing new solutions to new challenges of a kind not previously addressed by big tech.  It's working fast, at scale, and we're making a difference.  ", '- BS degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or other relevant majors with 2+ year of work experience ', '- Extend and improve ML frameworks and platforms, creating next-generation capabilities for detecting the emerging threat in fraud and risk-related scenarios.', '- Solid technical / data-mining skills and ability to work with large volume data to detect and identify abusive actions in our products', '- Strong working knowledge of machine learning algorithms including classifiers, clustering algorithms, and anomaly detection', 'TikTok is committed to providing reasonable accommodations during our recruitment process. If you need assistance or accommodation, please reach out to us at USRC@tiktok.com.', 'Qualifications: ', '- Ability to think critically and to formulate solutions to problems in a clear, concise, and timely manner', 'TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Mumbai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo. ', 'Responsibilities:', "TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too."]

['', 'Fast learner and self-initiative personality.', 'We’re in a hyper growth stage both in technology and business and looking for an Operational Data Scientist to provide operational support and data analytics.', 'We strive for excellence. What you accomplish is more important than how many hours you work.', "What You'll Do", 'MOLOCO\xa0is a Silicon Valley startup with a mission to build infrastructure and services to leverage the rich data generated by the rapidly expanding mobile ecosystem with two product lines.\xa0MOLOCO Cloud,\xa0is our cutting-edge prediction engine that supports data-driven advertising performance for mobile app user acquisition and re-engagement advertising globally (mobile DSP).\xa0\xa0MOLOCO Engine\xa0is our large-scale infrastructure solution that provides a Bidder-as-a-service (BaaS) for mobile platforms to utilize and to monetize their data.', "You deserve a lot of freedom and perks (such as free food) because we believe you will be a responsible teammate and act in MOLOCO's best interest.", 'The right candidate will make a huge impact at our ambitious, growing company. Come join our MOLOCO team and leverage our technology to help companies grow their business.', 'Data analysis: analyzing and visualizing data from lots of mobile apps to provide insights to existing and future campaigns using standard tools including SQL and charting libraries.', 'Data validation: verifying the first party data we obtain from ad exchange and the third party mobile app tracking solutions so that our campaign models get trained with accurate data.', "We believe that a great workplace comes with stellar colleagues; we obsess over hiring the best.We strive for excellence. What you accomplish is more important than how many hours you work.You deserve a lot of freedom and perks (such as free food) because we believe you will be a responsible teammate and act in MOLOCO's best interest.We believe in people managing their own career growth and support self-improvement. We learn from each other and help each other grow.", 'Experience in SQL or other data analytics language preferred.', "What You'll Need to Succeed", 'Ability to multi-task and manage multiple projects at a time while paying attention to detail.', 'Great communication skills required.', 'We believe in people managing their own career growth and support self-improvement. We learn from each other and help each other grow.', 'Strong analytical and problem-solving skills required.Great communication skills required.Bachelor’s degree in data related field required.Experience in SQL or other data analytics language preferred.Ability to multi-task and manage multiple projects at a time while paying attention to detail.Fast learner and self-initiative personality.', 'Working cross-functionally to support campaign management and communication.', 'Campaign optimization: engaging in the lifecycle of campaigns from building the initial lookalike model, monitoring daily performance, and advancing machine learning models.', 'Bachelor’s degree in data related field required.', 'Working cross-functionally to support campaign management and communication.Data analysis: analyzing and visualizing data from lots of mobile apps to provide insights to existing and future campaigns using standard tools including SQL and charting libraries.Data validation: verifying the first party data we obtain from ad exchange and the third party mobile app tracking solutions so that our campaign models get trained with accurate data.Campaign optimization: engaging in the lifecycle of campaigns from building the initial lookalike model, monitoring daily performance, and advancing machine learning models.', 'We believe that a great workplace comes with stellar colleagues; we obsess over hiring the best.', 'Strong analytical and problem-solving skills required.', 'MOLOCO Culture']

to perform automated rare disease genome interpretation, reducing interpretation time and increasing diagnostic accuracy and yield, and enabling the scalable analysis of 100,000’s of genomes.', job_text: ['', "What You'll Do", 'Conduct research and implementation of novel machine learning and statistical approaches to address medium-to-long term business and product problems', 'Proficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Spark.', 'About The Role', 'Experience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), causal inference.', 'Build statistical, optimization, and machine learning models the product efficiency and scalability', 'Work with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutions', '.', 'Ability to use a language like Python or R to work efficiently at scale with large data sets.', 'Leverage data to understand product performance and to identify improvement opportunities', 'M.S. degree in Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields with 3+ years of industry experience ', 'Experience in algorithm development and prototyping.', 'this form', 'Knowledge of experimental design and analysis', 'Proficiency in Java', 'Ph.D., M.S. or Bachelors degree in Statistics, Economics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields. impact the growth, efficiency, and reliability of Uber’s marketplace.', 'Experience with productionizing algorithms for real-time systems', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'M.S. degree in Statistics, job_text: ['', 'Minimum 1 year of working experience as a data scientist', "What You'll Do", 'About The Role', '3+ years of working experience as a data scientistPrevious experience in advertising tech (e.g. market response modeling, forecasting, attribution, targeting, 3rd party data integration, and etc) is a plusRelevant work experience in applying advanced analytics or data science to marketing problemsExperience with big data using technologies like Hadoop, Hive, and Spark a plusStrong communication skillsOrganized and have the ability to balance attention to detail with swift executionAble to multitask and be a great teammateHunger and drive to learn complex topicsPassion for Uber!', 'Build tools and products that will optimize each part of the marketing funnel (from prospecting to sign up to early user to active user and churn), as well as to support budget planning, measurement, attribution, targeting, cross-sell/up-sell, paid channel optimization, and segmentation for core Uber businesses globally', 'Advanced SQL skills - job_title: (Senior) Data Scientist - Applied Machine Learning or Operations Research
job_text: ['', "What You'll Do", 'Conduct research and implementation of novel machine learning and statistical approaches to address medium-to-long term business and product problems', 'Proficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Spark.', 'About The Role', 'Experience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), causal inference.', 'Build statistical, optimization, and machine learning models the product efficiency and scalability', 'Work with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutions', '.', 'Ability to use a language like Python or R to work efficiently at scale with large data sets.', 'Leverage data to understand product performance and to identify improvement opportunities', 'M.S. degree in Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields with 3+ years of industry experience ', 'Experience in algorithm development and prototyping.', 'this form', 'Knowledge of experimental design and analysis', 'Proficiency in Java', 'Ph.D., M.S. or Bachelors degree in Statistics, Economics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields. (If M.S. degree, a minimum of 1+ years of industry experience required and if Bachelor’s degree, a minimum of 2+ years of industry experience as a Data Scientist or equivalent)', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Experience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis and testing, and model development', 'Use machine learning, data mining, statistical techniques and others to create actionable, meaningful, and scalable solutions that powers all consumer facing products and features on the Uber Eats and/or Rides apps.', 'Collaborate with cross functional team (engineers, product analysts, product managers, designers) to define the business problem, identify the opportunities, and execute team and product strategies', 'Ph.D. in Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative field ', 'Establish scalable, efficient, automated processes to boost team productivity, such as model development, model validation and model implementation', 'Ph.D., M.S. or Bachelors degree in Statistics, Economics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields. impact the growth, efficiency, and reliability of Uber’s marketplace.', 'Experience with productionizing algorithms for real-time systems', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'M.S. degree in Statistics, job_title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning, Planning & Measurement
job_text: ['', 'Minimum 1 year of working experience as a data scientist', "What You'll Do", 'About The Role', '3+ years of working experience as a data scientistPrevious experience in advertising tech (e.g. market response modeling, forecasting, attribution, targeting, 3rd party data integration, and etc) is a plusRelevant work experience in applying advanced analytics or data science to marketing problemsExperience with big data using technologies like Hadoop, Hive, and Spark a plusStrong communication skillsOrganized and have the ability to balance attention to detail with swift executionAble to multitask and be a great teammateHunger and drive to learn complex topicsPassion for Uber!', 'Build tools and products that will optimize each part of the marketing funnel (from prospecting to sign up to early user to active user and churn), as well as to support budget planning, measurement, attribution, targeting, cross-sell/up-sell, paid channel optimization, and segmentation for core Uber businesses globally', 'Advanced SQL skills - comfortable working with very large data sets', 'Build production grade models on large-scale datasets to optimize marketing Build production grade models on large-scale datasets to optimize marketing performance by utilizing advanced statistical modeling, machine learning, or data mining techniques and marketing science researchUse models to address key growth challenges and provide relevant insights on problems such as cross-channel optimization, market/individual level response modeling, targeting optimization, propensity modeling, uplift modeling, etcWork with cross-functional teams to implement and deploy models and improve analytical solutions by providing data-driven recommendationsUse large scale data processing such as Spark, Hive, and Uber’s proprietary machine learning platform, and moreCollaborate with marketing leadership, design, product and engineering teamsParticipate in project planning/prioritization meetings, partner meetings, data prioritization meetings, etcBuild tools and products that will optimize each part of the marketing funnel (from prospecting to sign up to early user to active user and churn), as well as to support budget planning, measurement, attribution, targeting, cross-sell/up-sell, paid channel optimization, and segmentation for core Uber businesses globally', 'Strong communication skills', 'Work with cross-functional teams to implement and deploy models and improve analytical solutions by providing data-driven recommendations', 'Passion for Uber!', 'Participate in project planning/prioritization meetings, partner meetings, data prioritization meetings, etc', 'Minimum 1 year of working experience as a data scientistExpertise with R and/or PythonAdvanced SQL skills - comfortable working with very large data setsExperience with machine learning techniques and advanced analytics (e.g. regression, classification, clustering, time series, econometrics, causal inference, mathematical optimization)', 'Relevant work experience in applying advanced analytics or data science to marketing problems', 'Experience with big data using technologies like Hadoop, Hive, and Spark a plus', 'Hunger and drive to learn complex topics', 'Experience with machine learning techniques and advanced analytics (e.g. regression, classification, clustering, time series, econometrics, causal inference, mathematical optimization)', 'Organized and have the ability to balance attention to detail with swift execution', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Use large scale data processing such as Spark, Hive, and Uber’s proprietary machine learning platform, and more', 'Previous experience in advertising tech (e.g. market response modeling, forecasting, attribution, targeting, 3rd party data integration, and etc) is a plus', 'Collaborate with marketing leadership, design, product and engineering teams', 'Use models to address key growth challenges and provide relevant insights on problems such as cross-channel optimization, market/individual level response modeling, targeting optimization, propensity modeling, uplift modeling, etc', 'Expertise with R and/or Python', 'Able to multitask and be a great teammate', 'Build production grade models on large-scale datasets to optimize marketing Build production grade models on large-scale datasets to optimize marketing performance by utilizing advanced statistical modeling, machine learning, or data mining techniques and marketing science research', '3+ years of working experience as a data scientist', 'Preferred Qualifications']

job_title: Data Scientist - Research and Economics, Special Projects
job_text: ['', 'Be part of the technology company whose platform is used globally by over 4 million people to earn money and over 100 million people to move around their cities', "What You'll Do", 'About The Role', 'Be part of the technology company whose platform is used globally by over 4 million people to earn money and over 100 million people to move around their citiesExposure to a unique set of projects: your work will influence some of the most pressing policy issues across the company and around the worldJoin an encouraging, inclusive company and team that will be invested in you and your professional growth and success!', 'Experience in data science, with a demonstrable ability to use tools such as SQL, Python, and R to work efficiently at scale', 'A degree in Economics, Statistics, Math, or another quantitative field; candidates with a relevant PhD and/or extensive experience will be evaluated (and compensated) commensurate with their education and experience', 'Experience in policy research, particularly background in developing and bringing quantitative evidence to bear on public policy and legal strategiesExcellent project management skills and the ability to develop and maintain collaborative and productive research relationships with other teams around the companyPassion for Uber!', 'Join an encouraging, inclusive company and team that will be invested in you and your professional growth and success!', 'Conduct careful statistical and econometric analysis in support of our policy priorities, collaborating with international teams to develop research that speaks to their local contexts', 'Experience in economics research, with a track record of working independently and executing a research plan with minimal oversight', 'Ensure alignment between policy research and business strategy, building on a rich understanding of - and relationships across - policy, product, legal, data science, and operations', 'Exposure to a unique set of projects: your work will influence some of the most pressing policy issues across the company and around the world', 'Passion for Uber!', 'Excellent project management skills and the ability to develop and maintain collaborative and productive research relationships with other teams around the company', "What You'll Get", 'Experience in policy research, particularly background in developing and bringing quantitative evidence to bear on public policy and legal strategies', 'Basic Qualifications', 'A degree in Economics, Statistics, Math, or another quantitative field; candidates with a relevant PhD and/or extensive experience will be evaluated (and compensated) commensurate with their education and experienceExperience in data science, with a demonstrable ability to use tools such as SQL, Python, and R to work efficiently at scaleExperience in economics research, with a track record of working independently and executing a research plan with minimal oversight', 'Present economic reasoning and analytical results to internal audiences (e.g., our leadership team) and external audiences (e.g., policy partners)', 'Ensure alignment between policy research and business strategy, building on a rich understanding of - and relationships across - policy, product, legal, data science, and operationsConduct careful statistical and econometric analysis in support of our policy priorities, collaborating with international teams to develop research that speaks to their local contextsPresent economic reasoning and analytical results to internal audiences (e.g., our leadership team) and external audiences (e.g., policy partners)', 'Preferred Qualifications']

job_title: (Senior) Data Scientist- Pricing, Statistics and/or Econometrics
job_text: ['', 'Rider/Driver Incentives: Owns the Subscription Plan, Rewards/Loyalty Plan, and Promotions that are regularly sent out; they build production ML models, run and analyze network-level experiments, and use mechanism design theory to design incentives.', "What You'll Do", 'Proficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Spark.', 'About The Role', 'Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate all aspects of Uber’s core ridesharing products.', 'Work with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutions', 'Here Are The Teams That Make It Happen', 'Ability to use a language like Python or R to work efficiently at scale with large data sets.', 'Experience with causal ML methods is a plus', 'Solve ambiguous, challenging business problems using data-driven approaches.', 'Platforms:', 'Communicate with senior management and multi-functional teams.', 'Build statistical, optimization, and machine learning models for applications including pricing, targeting, and experimentationWork with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutionsPresent findings to business leaders to inform decisionsSolve ambiguous, challenging business problems using data-driven approaches.Work closely with multi-functional leads to develop technical vision and drive team direction.Establish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentation.Communicate with senior management and multi-functional teams.', 'Rider/Driver Incentives:', 'Experience in algorithm development and prototyping.', 'Expertise in convex programming, computational optimization, and operations research', 'Pricing:', 'Knowledge of experimental design and analysis', 'Pricing: Responsible for modeling rider and driver behavior,setting prices to optimize long run network efficiency, and dynamically adjusting those prices to ensure balance & reliabilityRider/Driver Incentives: Owns the Subscription Plan, Rewards/Loyalty Plan, and Promotions that are regularly sent out; they build production ML models, run and analyze network-level experiments, and use mechanism design theory to design incentives.', 'Tech lead experience and passion for mentoring ', 'Build statistical, optimization, and machine learning models for applications including pricing, targeting, and experimentation', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Experience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis and testing, and model development', "Ph.D., M.S. or Bachelors degree in Statistics, Economics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields. (If M.S. degree, a minimum of 1+ years of industry experience required and if Bachelor's degree, a minimum of 2+ years of industry experience as a Data Scientist or equivalent)Knowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics, machine learning, optimization, economics, and analytics.Knowledge of experimental design and analysisExperience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis and testing, and model developmentAbility to use a language like Python or R to work efficiently at scale with large data sets.Proficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Spark.", 'Fares: Platforms and UX for upfront pricing, promotions, and fare generation for all of Uber worldwide. Responsible for fare accuracy, UX, and real-time fare generation. They build large-scale real-time machine learning models to predict travel time and distance more accurately; optimize parameters to make upfront price experience better; prevent defect trips for drivers using product innovations, etc.', 'Establish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentation.', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly expanding on-demand food delivery business currently operating in more than 45 countries globally.", 'Pricing: Maximize efficiency and maintain reliability in the three-sided marketplace (eater, courier/delivery partner, and restaurant) of Uber Eats. Our algorithms operate globally at a scale of hundreds of thousands of restaurants, millions of delivery partners, tens of millions of eaters, and billions of dollars per year.', 'Experience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), as well as causal inference.Experience in algorithm development and prototyping.Experience with causal ML methods is a plusTech lead experience and passion for mentoring Experience with productionizing algorithms for real-time systemsExpertise in convex programming, computational optimization, and operations research', 'Present findings to business leaders to inform decisions', "Ph.D., M.S. or Bachelors degree in Statistics, Economics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields. (If M.S. degree, a minimum of 1+ years of industry experience required and if Bachelor's degree, a minimum of 2+ years of industry experience as a Data Scientist or equivalent)", 'Knowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics, machine learning, optimization, economics, and analytics.', 'Experience with productionizing algorithms for real-time systems', 'Work closely with multi-functional leads to develop technical vision and drive team direction.', 'Rides:', 'Fares:', 'Preferred Qualifications', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly expanding on-demand food delivery business currently operating in more than 45 countries globally.Pricing: Maximize efficiency and maintain reliability in the three-sided marketplace (eater, courier/delivery partner, and restaurant) of Uber Eats. Our algorithms operate globally at a scale of hundreds of thousands of restaurants, millions of delivery partners, tens of millions of eaters, and billions of dollars per year.Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate all aspects of Uber’s core ridesharing products.", 'Experience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), as well as causal inference.', 'Eats: ', 'Platforms: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber’s trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally.Fares: Platforms and UX for upfront pricing, promotions, and fare generation for all of Uber worldwide. Responsible for fare accuracy, UX, and real-time fare generation. They build large-scale real-time machine learning models to predict travel time and distance more accurately; optimize parameters to make upfront price experience better; prevent defect trips for drivers using product innovations, etc.', 'Pricing: Responsible for modeling rider and driver behavior,setting prices to optimize long run network efficiency, and dynamically adjusting those prices to ensure balance & reliability']

job_text: ['', "What You'll Do", 'Conduct research and implementation of novel machine learning and statistical approaches to address medium-to-long term business and product problems', 'Proficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Spark.', 'About The Role', 'Experience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), causal inference.', 'Build statistical, optimization, and machine learning models the product efficiency and scalability', 'Work with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutions', '.', 'Ability to use a language like Python or R to work efficiently at scale with large data sets.', 'Leverage data to understand product performance and to identify improvement opportunities', 'M.S. degree in Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields with 3+ years of industry experience ', 'Experience in algorithm development and prototyping.', 'this form', 'Knowledge of experimental design and analysis', 'Proficiency in Java', 'Ph.D., M.S. or Bachelors degree in Statistics, Economics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields. job_title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning, Planning & Measurement
job_text: ['', 'Minimum 1 year of working experience as a data scientist', "What You'll Do", 'About The Role', '3+ years of working experience as a data scientistPrevious experience in advertising tech (e.g. market response modeling, forecasting, attribution, targeting, 3rd party data integration, and etc) is a plusRelevant work experience in applying advanced analytics or data science to marketing problemsExperience with big data using technologies like Hadoop, Hive, and Spark a plusStrong communication skillsOrganized and have the ability to balance attention to detail with swift executionAble to multitask and be a great teammateHunger and drive to learn complex topicsPassion for Uber!', 'Build tools and products that will optimize each part of the marketing funnel (from prospecting to sign up to early user to active user and churn), as well as to support budget planning, measurement, attribution, targeting, cross-sell/up-sell, paid channel optimization, and segmentation for core Uber businesses globally', 'Advanced SQL skills - comfortable working with very large data sets', 'Build production grade models on large-scale datasets to optimize marketing Build production grade models on large-scale datasets to optimize marketing performance by utilizing advanced statistical modeling, machine learning, or data mining techniques and marketing science researchUse models to address key growth challenges and provide relevant insights on problems such as cross-channel optimization, market/individual level response modeling, targeting optimization, propensity modeling, uplift modeling, etcWork with cross-functional teams to implement and deploy models and improve analytical solutions by providing data-driven recommendationsUse large scale data processing such as Spark, Hive, and Uber’s proprietary machine learning platform, and moreCollaborate with marketing leadership, design, product and engineering teamsParticipate in project planning/prioritization meetings, partner meetings, data prioritization meetings, etcBuild tools and products that will optimize each part of the marketing funnel (from prospecting to sign up to early user to active user and churn), as well as to support budget planning, measurement, attribution, targeting, cross-sell/up-sell, paid channel optimization, and segmentation for core Uber businesses globally', 'Strong communication skills', 'Work with cross-functional teams to implement and deploy models and improve analytical solutions by providing data-driven recommendations', 'Passion for Uber!', 'Participate in project planning/prioritization meetings, partner meetings, data prioritization meetings, etc', 'Minimum 1 year of working experience as a data scientistExpertise with R and/or PythonAdvanced SQL skills - comfortable working with very large data setsExperience with machine learning techniques and advanced analytics (e.g. regression, classification, clustering, time series, econometrics, causal inference, mathematical optimization)', 'Relevant work experience in applying advanced analytics or data science to marketing problems', 'Experience with big data using technologies like Hadoop, Hive, and Spark a plus', 'Hunger and drive to learn complex topics', 'Experience with machine learning techniques and advanced analytics (e.g. regression, classification, clustering, time series, econometrics, causal inference, mathematical optimization)', 'Organized and have the ability to balance attention to detail with swift execution', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Use large scale data processing such as Spark, Hive, and Uber’s proprietary machine learning platform, and more', 'Previous experience in advertising tech (e.g. market response modeling, forecasting, attribution, targeting, 3rd party data integration, and etc) is a plus', 'Collaborate with marketing leadership, design, product and engineering teams', 'Use models to address key growth challenges and provide relevant insights on problems such as cross-channel optimization, market/individual level response modeling, targeting optimization, propensity modeling, uplift modeling, etc', 'Expertise with R and/or Python', 'Able to multitask and be a great teammate', 'Build production grade models on large-scale datasets to optimize marketing Build production grade models on large-scale datasets to optimize marketing performance by utilizing advanced statistical modeling, machine learning, or data mining techniques and marketing science research', '3+ years of working experience as a data scientist', 'Preferred Qualifications']

job_title: Data Scientist - Research and Economics, Special Projects
job_text: ['', 'Be part of the technology company whose platform is used globally by over 4 million people to earn money and over 100 million people to move around their cities', "What You'll Do", 'About The Role', 'Be part of the technology company whose platform is used globally by over 4 million people to earn money and over 100 million people to move around their citiesExposure to a unique set of projects: your work will influence some of the most pressing policy issues across the company and around the worldJoin an encouraging, inclusive company and team that will be invested in you and your professional growth and success!', 'Experience in data science, with a demonstrable ability to use tools such as SQL, Python, and R to work efficiently at scale', 'A degree in Economics, Statistics, Math, or another quantitative field; candidates with a relevant PhD and/or extensive experience will be evaluated (and compensated) commensurate with their education and experience', 'Experience in policy research, particularly background in developing and bringing quantitative evidence to bear on public policy and legal strategiesExcellent project management skills and the ability to develop and maintain collaborative and productive research relationships with other teams around the companyPassion for Uber!', 'Join an encouraging, inclusive company and team that will be invested in you and your professional growth and success!', 'Conduct careful statistical and econometric analysis in support of our policy priorities, collaborating with international teams to develop research that speaks to their local contexts', 'Experience in economics research, with a track record of working independently and executing a research plan with minimal oversight', 'Ensure alignment between policy research and business strategy, building on a rich understanding of - and relationships across - policy, product, legal, data science, and operations', 'Exposure to a unique set of projects: your work will influence some of the most pressing policy issues across the company and around the world', 'Passion for Uber!', 'Excellent project management skills and the ability to develop and maintain collaborative and productive research relationships with other teams around the company', "What You'll Get", 'Experience in policy research, particularly background in developing and bringing quantitative evidence to bear on public policy and legal strategies', 'Basic Qualifications', 'A degree in Economics, Statistics, Math, or another quantitative field; candidates with a relevant PhD and/or extensive experience will be evaluated (and compensated) commensurate with their education and experienceExperience in data science, with a demonstrable ability to use tools such as SQL, Python, and R to work efficiently at scaleExperience in economics research, with a track record of working independently and executing a research plan with minimal oversight', 'Present economic reasoning and analytical results to internal audiences (e.g., our leadership team) and external audiences (e.g., policy partners)', 'Ensure alignment between policy research and business strategy, building on a rich understanding of - and relationships across - policy, product, legal, data science, and operationsConduct careful statistical and econometric analysis in support of our policy priorities, collaborating with international teams to develop research that speaks to their local contextsPresent economic reasoning and analytical results to internal audiences (e.g., our leadership team) and external audiences (e.g., policy partners)', 'Preferred Qualifications']

['', 'About The Role', 'Anticipated graduation between Winter 2021-Bpring 2022Ability to communicate effectively with both technical and business partnersResearch mentality with a bias towards action to structure a project from idea to experimentation to prototype to implementationExperience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), as well as causal inferenceIndependence, excellent communication, and outstanding follow-through - you energetically tackle your work and love the responsibility of being individually empowered', 'Work with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutions', 'Here Are The Teams That Make It Happen', 'Platform:', 'Current Ph.D. student majoring in Computer Science, Economics, Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fieldsKnowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics, machine learning, optimization, economics, and analyticsExperience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis, testing, and model developmentProficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Python', 'Proficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Python', 'Knowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics, machine learning, optimization, economics, and analytics', 'Ability to communicate effectively with both technical and business partners', 'What You’ll Do', 'Experience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), as well as causal inference', 'Experience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis, testing, and model development', 'Work with your mentor closely to scope a project, define the problem, and develop and prototype the solution using data-driven approaches', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Research mentality with a bias towards action to structure a project from idea to experimentation to prototype to implementation', 'Independence, excellent communication, and outstanding follow-through - you energetically tackle your work and love the responsibility of being individually empowered', "Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides interns will tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems; efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system; developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network; optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate all aspects of our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.", 'Rides', 'Current Ph.D. student majoring in Computer Science, Economics, Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields', "Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Interns on the Platform team will work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization, and ranking.", 'Establish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentation', 'Present findings to business leaders to inform decisions', 'Anticipated graduation between Winter 2021-Bpring 2022', 'Work with your mentor closely to scope a project, define the problem, and develop and prototype the solution using data-driven approachesWork with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutionsPresent findings to business leaders to inform decisionsEstablish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentationConduct experiments to advise product decisions', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eat is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Eats interns will work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and discover insights to improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.", 'Preferred Qualifications', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eat is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Eats interns will work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and discover insights to improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides interns will tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems; efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system; developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network; optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate all aspects of our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Interns on the Platform team will work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization, and ranking.", 'Eats:', 'Conduct experiments to advise product decisions']

job_title: (Senior) Data Scientist - Applied Machine Learning or Operations Research
job_text: ['', "What You'll Do", 'Conduct research and implementation of novel machine learning and statistical approaches to address medium-to-long term business and product problems', 'Proficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Spark.', 'About The Role', 'Experience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), causal inference.', 'Build statistical, optimization, and machine learning models the product efficiency and scalability', 'Work with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutions', '.', 'Ability to use a language like Python or R to work efficiently at scale with large data sets.', 'Leverage data to understand product performance and to identify improvement opportunities', 'M.S. degree in Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields with 3+ years of industry experience ', 'Experience in algorithm development and prototyping.', 'this form', 'Knowledge of experimental design and analysis', 'Proficiency in Java', 'Ph.D., M.S. or Bachelors degree in Statistics, Economics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields. (If M.S. degree, a minimum of 1+ years of industry experience required and if Bachelor’s degree, a minimum of 2+ years of industry experience as a Data Scientist or equivalent)', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Experience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis and testing, and model development', 'Use machine learning, data mining, statistical techniques and others to create actionable, meaningful, and scalable solutions that powers all consumer facing products and features on the Uber Eats and/or Rides apps.', 'Collaborate with cross functional team (engineers, product analysts, product managers, designers) to define the business problem, identify the opportunities, and execute team and product strategies', 'Ph.D. in Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative field ', 'Establish scalable, efficient, automated processes to boost team productivity, such as model development, model validation and model implementation', 'Ph.D., M.S. or Bachelors degree in Statistics, Economics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields. job_title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning, Planning & Measurement
job_text: ['', 'Minimum 1 year of working experience as a data scientist', "What You'll Do", 'About The Role', '3+ years of working experience as a data scientistPrevious experience in advertising tech (e.g. market response modeling, forecasting, attribution, targeting, 3rd party data integration, and etc) is a plusRelevant work experience in applying advanced analytics or data science to marketing problemsExperience with big data using technologies like Hadoop, Hive, and Spark a plusStrong communication skillsOrganized and have the ability to balance attention to detail with swift executionAble to multitask and be a great teammateHunger and drive to learn complex topicsPassion for Uber!', 'Build tools and products that will optimize each part of the marketing funnel (from prospecting to sign up to early user to active user and churn), as well as to support budget planning, measurement, attribution, targeting, cross-sell/up-sell, paid channel optimization, and segmentation for core Uber businesses globally', 'Advanced SQL skills - comfortable working with very large data sets', 'Build production grade models on large-scale datasets to optimize marketing Build production grade models on large-scale datasets to optimize marketing performance by utilizing advanced statistical modeling, machine learning, or data mining techniques and marketing science researchUse models to address key growth challenges and provide relevant insights on problems such as cross-channel optimization, market/individual level response modeling, targeting optimization, propensity modeling, uplift modeling, etcWork with cross-functional teams to implement and deploy models and improve analytical solutions by providing data-driven recommendationsUse large scale data processing such as Spark, Hive, and Uber’s proprietary machine learning platform, and moreCollaborate with marketing leadership, design, product and engineering teamsParticipate in project planning/prioritization meetings, partner meetings, data prioritization meetings, etcBuild tools and products that will optimize each part of the marketing funnel (from prospecting to sign up to early user to active user and churn), as well as to support budget planning, measurement, attribution, targeting, cross-sell/up-sell, paid channel optimization, and segmentation for core Uber businesses globally', 'Strong communication skills', 'Work with cross-functional teams to implement and deploy models and improve analytical solutions by providing data-driven recommendations', 'Passion for Uber!', 'Participate in project planning/prioritization meetings, partner meetings, data prioritization meetings, etc', 'Minimum 1 year of working experience as a data scientistExpertise with R and/or PythonAdvanced SQL skills - comfortable working with very large data setsExperience with machine learning techniques and advanced analytics (e.g. regression, classification, clustering, time series, econometrics, causal inference, mathematical optimization)', 'Relevant work experience in applying advanced analytics or data science to marketing problems', 'Experience with big data using technologies like Hadoop, Hive, and Spark a plus', 'Hunger and drive to learn complex topics', 'Experience with machine learning techniques and advanced analytics (e.g. regression, classification, clustering, time series, econometrics, causal inference, mathematical optimization)', 'Organized and have the ability to balance attention to detail with swift execution', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Use large scale data processing such as Spark, Hive, and Uber’s proprietary machine learning platform, and more', 'Previous experience in advertising tech (e.g. market response modeling, forecasting, attribution, targeting, 3rd party data integration, and etc) is a plus', 'Collaborate with marketing leadership, design, product and engineering teams', 'Use models to address key growth challenges and provide relevant insights on problems such as cross-channel optimization, market/individual level response modeling, targeting optimization, propensity modeling, uplift modeling, etc', 'Expertise with R and/or Python', 'Able to multitask and be a great teammate', 'Build production grade models on large-scale datasets to optimize marketing Build production grade models on large-scale datasets to optimize marketing performance by utilizing advanced statistical modeling, machine learning, or data mining techniques and marketing science research', '3+ years of working experience as a data scientist', 'Preferred Qualifications']

job_title: Data Scientist - Research and Economics, Special Projects
job_text: ['', 'Be part of the technology company whose platform is used globally by over 4 million people to earn money and over 100 million people to move around their cities', "What You'll Do", 'About The Role', 'Be part of the technology company whose platform is used globally by over 4 million people to earn money and over 100 million people to move around their citiesExposure to a unique set of projects: your work will influence some of the most pressing policy issues across the company and around the worldJoin an encouraging, inclusive company and team that will be invested in you and your professional growth and success!', 'Experience in data science, with a demonstrable ability to use tools such as SQL, Python, and R to work efficiently at scale', 'A degree in Economics, Statistics, Math, or another quantitative field; candidates with a relevant PhD and/or extensive experience will be evaluated (and compensated) commensurate with their education and experience', 'Experience in policy research, particularly background in developing and bringing quantitative evidence to bear on public policy and legal strategiesExcellent project management skills and the ability to develop and maintain collaborative and productive research relationships with other teams around the companyPassion for Uber!', 'Join an encouraging, inclusive company and team that will be invested in you and your professional growth and success!', 'Conduct careful statistical and econometric analysis in support of our policy priorities, collaborating with international teams to develop research that speaks to their local contexts', 'Experience in economics research, with a track record of working independently and executing a research plan with minimal oversight', 'Ensure alignment between policy research and business strategy, building on a rich understanding of - and relationships across - policy, product, legal, data science, and operations', 'Exposure to a unique set of projects: your work will influence some of the most pressing policy issues across the company and around the world', 'Passion for Uber!', 'Excellent project management skills and the ability to develop and maintain collaborative and productive research relationships with other teams around the company', "What You'll Get", 'Experience in policy research, particularly background in developing and bringing quantitative evidence to bear on public policy and legal strategies', 'Basic Qualifications', 'A degree in Economics, Statistics, Math, or another quantitative field; candidates with a relevant PhD and/or extensive experience will be evaluated (and compensated) commensurate with their education and experienceExperience in data science, with a demonstrable ability to use tools such as SQL, Python, and R to work efficiently at scaleExperience in economics research, with a track record of working independently and executing a research plan with minimal oversight', 'Present economic reasoning and analytical results to internal audiences (e.g., our leadership team) and external audiences (e.g., policy partners)', 'Ensure alignment between policy research and business strategy, building on a rich understanding of - and relationships across - policy, product, legal, data science, and operationsConduct careful statistical and econometric analysis in support of our policy priorities, collaborating with international teams to develop research that speaks to their local contextsPresent economic reasoning and analytical results to internal audiences (e.g., our leadership team) and external audiences (e.g., policy partners)', 'Preferred Qualifications']

job_title: (Senior) Data Scientist- Pricing, Statistics and/or Econometrics
job_text: ['', 'Rider/Driver Incentives: Owns the Subscription Plan, Rewards/Loyalty Plan, and Promotions that are regularly sent out; they build production ML models, run and analyze network-level experiments, and use mechanism design theory to design incentives.', "What You'll Do", 'Proficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Spark.', 'About The Role', 'Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate all aspects of Uber’s core ridesharing products.', 'Work with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutions', 'Here Are The Teams That Make It Happen', 'Ability to use a language like Python or R to work efficiently at scale with large data sets.', 'Experience with causal ML methods is a plus', 'Solve ambiguous, challenging business problems using data-driven approaches.', 'Platforms:', 'Communicate with senior management and multi-functional teams.', 'Build statistical, optimization, and machine learning models for applications including pricing, targeting, and experimentationWork with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutionsPresent findings to business leaders to inform decisionsSolve ambiguous, challenging business problems using data-driven approaches.Work closely with multi-functional leads to develop technical vision and drive team direction.Establish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentation.Communicate with senior management and multi-functional teams.', 'Rider/Driver Incentives:', 'Experience in algorithm development and prototyping.', 'Expertise in convex programming, computational optimization, and operations research', 'Pricing:', 'Knowledge of experimental design and analysis', 'Pricing: Responsible for modeling rider and driver behavior,setting prices to optimize long run network efficiency, and dynamically adjusting those prices to ensure balance & reliabilityRider/Driver Incentives: Owns the Subscription Plan, Rewards/Loyalty Plan, and Promotions that are regularly sent out; they build production ML models, run and analyze network-level experiments, and use mechanism design theory to design incentives.', 'Tech lead experience and passion for mentoring ', 'Build statistical, optimization, and machine learning models for applications including pricing, targeting, and experimentation', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Experience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis and testing, and model development', "Ph.D., M.S. or Bachelors degree in Statistics, Economics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields. (If M.S. degree, a minimum of 1+ years of industry experience required and if Bachelor's degree, a minimum of 2+ years of industry experience as a Data Scientist or equivalent)Knowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics, machine learning, optimization, economics, and analytics.Knowledge of experimental design and analysisExperience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis and testing, and model developmentAbility to use a language like Python or R to work efficiently at scale with large data sets.Proficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Spark.", 'Fares: Platforms and UX for upfront pricing, promotions, and fare generation for all of Uber worldwide. Responsible for fare accuracy, UX, and real-time fare generation. They build large-scale real-time machine learning models to predict travel time and distance more accurately; optimize parameters to make upfront price experience better; prevent defect trips for drivers using product innovations, etc.', 'Establish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentation.', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly expanding on-demand food delivery business currently operating in more than 45 countries globally.", 'Pricing: Maximize efficiency and maintain reliability in the three-sided marketplace (eater, courier/delivery partner, and restaurant) of Uber Eats. ['', 'About The Role', 'Anticipated graduation between Winter 2021-Bpring 2022Ability to communicate effectively with both technical and business partnersResearch mentality with a bias towards action to structure a project from idea to experimentation to prototype to implementationExperience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), as well as causal inferenceIndependence, excellent communication, and outstanding follow-through - you energetically tackle your work and love the responsibility of being individually empowered', 'Work with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutions', 'Here Are The Teams That Make It Happen', 'Platform:', 'Current Ph.D. student majoring in Computer Science, Economics, Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fieldsKnowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics, machine learning, optimization, economics, and analyticsExperience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis, testing, and model developmentProficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Python', 'Proficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Python', 'Knowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics, machine learning, optimization, economics, and analytics', 'Ability to communicate effectively with both technical and business partners', 'What You’ll Do', 'Experience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), as well as causal inference', 'Experience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis, testing, and model development', 'Work with your mentor closely to scope a project, define the problem, and develop and prototype the solution using data-driven approaches', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Research mentality with a bias towards action to structure a project from idea to experimentation to prototype to implementation', 'Independence, excellent communication, and outstanding follow-through - you energetically tackle your work and love the responsibility of being individually empowered', "Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides interns will tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems; efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system; developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network; optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate all aspects of our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.", 'Rides', 'Current Ph.D. student majoring in Computer Science, Economics, Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields', "Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Interns on the Platform team will work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization, and ranking.", 'Establish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentation', 'Present findings to business leaders to inform decisions', 'Anticipated graduation between Winter 2021-Bpring 2022', 'Work with your mentor closely to scope a project, define the problem, and develop and prototype the solution using data-driven approachesWork with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutionsPresent findings to business leaders to inform decisionsEstablish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentationConduct experiments to advise product decisions', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eat is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Eats interns will work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and discover insights to improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.", 'Preferred Qualifications', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eat is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Eats interns will work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and discover insights to improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides interns will tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems; efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system; developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network; optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate all aspects of our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Interns on the Platform team will work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization, and ranking.", 'Eats:', 'Conduct experiments to advise product decisions']

job_title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning, Building Information
job_text: ['', 'Optello is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer', 'Your Right to Work', 'Email Your Resume In Word To', 'Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : MC16-1598727 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***']

['', ' Build and release predictive models for retention and engagement using large datasets of user conversational behaviors and system performance to recommend and track the impact of feature improvements over time', ' Understanding of relevant statistical measures such as confidence intervals, significance of error measurements, development and evaluation data sets, etc.', ' Collaborate with colleagues from science, engineering and business backgrounds.', ' Ensure data quality throughout all stages of acquisition and processing, including such areas as data sourcing/collection, ground truth generation, normalization, and transformation.', 'Description', ' Build and release predictive models for retention and engagement using large datasets of user conversational behaviors and system performance to recommend and track the impact of feature improvements over time Ensure data quality throughout all stages of acquisition and processing, including such areas as data sourcing/collection, ground truth generation, normalization, and transformation. Collaborate with colleagues from science, engineering and business backgrounds. Present proposals and results to partner teams in a clear manner backed by data and coupled with actionable conclusions Define ML based techniques for sampling, judgment monitoring, A/B testing and efficient evaluations Work with engineers to develop efficient data querying infrastructure for both offline and online use cases', ' Knowledge of various machine learning techniques and key parameters that affect their performance', 'Company', ' Present proposals and results to partner teams in a clear manner backed by data and coupled with actionable conclusions', ' Work with engineers to develop efficient data querying infrastructure for both offline and online use cases', " PhD or equivalent Master's degree plus 4+ years of research experience in a quantitative filed", " PhD or equivalent Master's degree plus 4+ years of research experience in a quantitative filed Experience investigating the feasibility of applying scientific principals and concepts to business problems and products Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field, such as Computer Science, Applied Statistics, or Engineering 3+ years of experience with various machine learning/statistical modeling data analysis tools and techniques, and parameters that affect their performance Experience in Perl, Python, or another scripting language; command line usage Experience analyzing data to identify patterns and conducting error/deviation analysis Knowledge of various machine learning techniques and key parameters that affect their performance Understanding of relevant statistical measures such as confidence intervals, significance of error measurements, development and evaluation data sets, etc.", 'Basic Qualifications', ' Experience working as an Analytics Engineer or Data Scientist working with cross functional teams.', ' Experience working with enterprise reporting systems, data analytics. job_title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning, Planning & Measurement
job_text: ['', 'Minimum 1 year of working experience as a data scientist', "What You'll Do", 'About The Role', '3+ years of working experience as a data scientistPrevious experience in advertising tech (e.g. market response modeling, forecasting, attribution, targeting, 3rd party data integration, and etc) is a plusRelevant work experience in applying advanced analytics or data science to marketing problemsExperience with big data using technologies like Hadoop, Hive, and Spark a plusStrong communication skillsOrganized and have the ability to balance attention to detail with swift executionAble to multitask and be a great teammateHunger and drive to learn complex topicsPassion for Uber!', 'Build tools and products that will optimize each part of the marketing funnel (from prospecting to sign up to early user to active user and churn), as well as to support budget planning, measurement, attribution, targeting, cross-sell/up-sell, paid channel optimization, and segmentation for core Uber businesses globally', 'Advanced SQL skills - comfortable working with very large data sets', 'Build production grade models on large-scale datasets to optimize marketing Build production grade models on large-scale datasets to optimize marketing performance by utilizing advanced statistical modeling, machine learning, or data mining techniques and marketing science researchUse models to address key growth challenges and provide relevant insights on problems such as cross-channel optimization, market/individual level response modeling, targeting optimization, propensity modeling, uplift modeling, etcWork with cross-functional teams to implement and deploy models and improve analytical solutions by providing data-driven recommendationsUse large scale data processing such as Spark, Hive, and Uber’s proprietary machine learning platform, and moreCollaborate with marketing leadership, design, product and engineering teamsParticipate in project planning/prioritization meetings, partner meetings, data prioritization meetings, etcBuild tools and products that will optimize each part of the marketing funnel (from prospecting to sign up to early user to active user and churn), as well as to support budget planning, measurement, attribution, targeting, cross-sell/up-sell, paid channel optimization, and segmentation for core Uber businesses globally', 'Strong communication skills', 'Work with cross-functional teams to implement and deploy models and improve analytical solutions by providing data-driven recommendations', 'Passion for Uber!', 'Participate in project planning/prioritization meetings, partner meetings, data prioritization meetings, etc', 'Minimum 1 year of working experience as a data scientistExpertise with R and/or PythonAdvanced SQL skills - comfortable working with very large data setsExperience with machine learning techniques and advanced analytics (e.g. regression, classification, clustering, time series, econometrics, causal inference, mathematical optimization)', 'Relevant work experience in applying advanced analytics or data science to marketing problems', 'Experience with big data using technologies like Hadoop, Hive, and Spark a plus', 'Hunger and drive to learn complex topics', 'Experience with machine learning techniques and advanced analytics (e.g. regression, classification, clustering, time series, econometrics, causal inference, mathematical optimization)', 'Organized and have the ability to balance attention to detail with swift execution', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Use large scale data processing such as Spark, Hive, and Uber’s proprietary machine learning platform, and more', 'Previous experience in advertising tech (e.g. market response modeling, forecasting, attribution, targeting, 3rd party data integration, and etc) is a plus', 'Collaborate with marketing leadership, design, product and engineering teams', 'Use models to address key growth challenges and provide relevant insights on problems such as cross-channel optimization, market/individual level response modeling, targeting optimization, propensity modeling, uplift modeling, etc', 'Expertise with R and/or Python', 'Able to multitask and be a great teammate', 'Build production grade models on large-scale datasets to optimize marketing Build production grade models on large-scale datasets to optimize marketing performance by utilizing advanced statistical modeling, machine learning, or data mining techniques and marketing science research', '3+ years of working experience as a data scientist', 'Preferred Qualifications']

job_title: Data Scientist - Research and Economics, Special Projects
job_text: ['', 'Be part of the technology company whose platform is used globally by over 4 million people to earn money and over 100 million people to move around their cities', "What You'll Do", 'About The Role', 'Be part of the technology company whose platform is used globally by over 4 million people to earn money and over 100 million people to move around their citiesExposure to a unique set of projects: your work will influence some of the most pressing policy issues across the company and around the worldJoin an encouraging, inclusive company and team that will be invested in you and your professional growth and success!', 'Experience in data science, with a demonstrable ability to use tools such as SQL, Python, and R to work efficiently at scale', 'A degree in Economics, Statistics, Math, or another quantitative field; candidates with a relevant PhD and/or extensive experience will be evaluated (and compensated) commensurate with their education and experience', 'Experience in policy research, particularly background in developing and bringing quantitative evidence to bear on public policy and legal strategiesExcellent project management skills and the ability to develop and maintain collaborative and productive research relationships with other teams around the companyPassion for Uber!', 'Join an encouraging, inclusive company and team that will be invested in you and your professional growth and success!', 'Conduct careful statistical and econometric analysis in support of our policy priorities, collaborating with international teams to develop research that speaks to their local contexts', 'Experience in economics research, with a track record of working independently and executing a research plan with minimal oversight', 'Ensure alignment between policy research and business strategy, building on a rich understanding of - and relationships across - policy, product, legal, data science, and operations', 'Exposure to a unique set of projects: your work will influence some of the most pressing policy issues across the company and around the world', 'Passion for Uber!', 'Excellent project management skills and the ability to develop and maintain collaborative and productive research relationships with other teams around the company', "What You'll Get", 'Experience in policy research, particularly background in developing and bringing quantitative evidence to bear on public policy and legal strategies', 'Basic Qualifications', 'A degree in Economics, Statistics, Math, or another quantitative field; candidates with a relevant PhD and/or extensive experience will be evaluated (and compensated) commensurate with their education and experienceExperience in data science, with a demonstrable ability to use tools such as SQL, Python, and R to work efficiently at scaleExperience in economics research, with a track record of working independently and executing a research plan with minimal oversight', 'Present economic reasoning and analytical results to internal audiences (e.g., our leadership team) and external audiences (e.g., policy partners)', 'Ensure alignment between policy research and business strategy, building on a rich understanding of - and relationships across - policy, product, legal, data science, and operationsConduct careful statistical and econometric analysis in support of our policy priorities, collaborating with international teams to develop research that speaks to their local contextsPresent economic reasoning and analytical results to internal audiences (e.g., our leadership team) and external audiences (e.g., policy partners)', 'Preferred Qualifications']

job_title: (Senior) Data Scientist- Pricing, Statistics and/or Econometrics
job_text: ['', 'Rider/Driver Incentives: Owns the Subscription Plan, Rewards/Loyalty Plan, and Promotions that are regularly sent out; they build production ML models, run and analyze network-level experiments, and use mechanism design theory to design incentives.', "What You'll Do", 'Proficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Spark.', 'About The Role', 'Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate all aspects of Uber’s core ridesharing products.', 'Work with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutions', 'Here Are The Teams That Make It Happen', 'Ability to use a language like Python or R to work efficiently at scale with large data sets.', 'Experience with causal ML methods is a plus', 'Solve ambiguous, challenging business problems using data-driven approaches.', 'Platforms:', 'Communicate with senior management and multi-functional teams.', 'Build statistical, optimization, and machine learning models for applications including pricing, targeting, and experimentationWork with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutionsPresent findings to business leaders to inform decisionsSolve ambiguous, challenging business problems using data-driven approaches.Work closely with multi-functional leads to develop technical vision and drive team direction.Establish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentation.Communicate with senior management and multi-functional teams.', 'Rider/Driver Incentives:', 'Experience in algorithm development and prototyping.', 'Expertise in convex programming, computational optimization, and operations research', 'Pricing:', 'Knowledge of experimental design and analysis', 'Pricing: Responsible for modeling rider and driver behavior,setting prices to optimize long run network efficiency, and dynamically adjusting those prices to ensure balance & reliabilityRider/Driver Incentives: Owns the Subscription Plan, Rewards/Loyalty Plan, and Promotions that are regularly sent out; they build production ML models, run and analyze network-level experiments, and use mechanism design theory to design incentives.', 'Tech lead experience and passion for mentoring ', 'Build statistical, optimization, and machine learning models for applications including pricing, targeting, and experimentation', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Experience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis and testing, and model development', "Ph.D.,
