exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis, testing, and model developmentProficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Python', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eats is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Data scientists on Eats come from a variety of technical backgrounds and work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.", 'Proficiency with Java', 'Basic Qualifications', "Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Platform Data Scientists work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization and ranking, and experimentation design and analysis for new algorithm/feature/product launches.", "Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate all aspects of Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides Data Scientists tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems, efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system, developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network, optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.", "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eats is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Data scientists on Eats come from a variety of technical backgrounds and work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate all aspects of Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides Data Scientists tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems, efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system, developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network, optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Platform Data Scientists work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization and ranking, and experimentation design and analysis for new algorithm/feature/product launches.", 'Rides', 'Currently pursuing a Ph.D. in Statistics, Economics, Computer Science, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields with an anticipated graduation date in winter 2020-summer 2021', 'Establish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentation', 'Present findings to business leaders to inform decisions', 'Previous industry experience (i.e. internships)', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Experience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), as well as causal inference', 'Eats:', 'Leverage data to understand product performance and identify improvement opportunities', 'Build intelligent products to provide the best user experience']

job_title: Data Scientist - Research and Economics, Special Projects
job_text: ['', 'Be part of the technology company whose platform is used globally by over 4 million people to earn money and over 100 million people to move around their cities', "What You'll Do", 'About The Role', 'Be part of the technology company whose platform is used globally by over 4 million people to earn money and over 100 million people to move around their citiesExposure to a unique set of projects: your work will influence some of the most pressing policy issues across the company and around the worldJoin an encouraging, inclusive company and team that will be invested in you and your professional growth and success!', 'Experience in data science, with a demonstrable ability to use tools such as SQL, Python, and R to work efficiently at scale', 'A degree in Economics, Statistics, Math, or another quantitative field; candidates with a relevant PhD and/or extensive experience will be evaluated (and compensated) commensurate with their education and experience', 'Experience in policy research, particularly background in developing and bringing quantitative evidence to bear on public policy and legal strategiesExcellent project management skills and the ability to develop and maintain collaborative and productive research relationships with other teams around the companyPassion for Uber!', 'Join an encouraging, inclusive company and team that will be invested in you and your professional growth and success!', 'Conduct careful statistical and econometric analysis in support of our policy priorities, collaborating with international teams to develop research that speaks to their local contexts', 'Experience in economics research, with a track record of working independently and executing a research plan with minimal oversight', 'Ensure alignment between policy research and business strategy, building on a rich understanding of - and relationships across - policy, product, legal, data science, and operations', 'Exposure to a unique set of projects: your work will influence some of the most pressing policy issues across the company and around the world', 'Passion for Uber!', 'Excellent project management skills and the ability to develop and maintain collaborative and productive research relationships with other teams around the company', "What You'll Get", 'Experience in policy research, particularly background in developing and bringing quantitative evidence to bear on public policy and legal strategies', 'Basic Qualifications', 'A degree in Economics, Statistics, Math, or another quantitative field; candidates with a relevant PhD and/or extensive experience will be evaluated (and compensated) commensurate with their education and experienceExperience in data science, with a demonstrable ability to use tools such as SQL, Python, and R to work efficiently at scaleExperience in economics research, with a track record of working independently and executing a research plan with minimal oversight', 'Present economic reasoning and analytical results to internal audiences (e.g., our leadership team) and external audiences (e.g., policy partners)', 'Ensure alignment between policy research and business strategy, building on a rich understanding of - and relationships across - policy, product, legal, data science, and operationsConduct careful statistical and econometric analysis in support of our policy priorities, collaborating with international teams to develop research that speaks to their local contextsPresent economic reasoning and analytical results to internal audiences (e.g., our leadership team) and external audiences (e.g., policy partners)', 'Preferred Qualifications']

job_title: Quantum Research Scientist, Test and Measurement
job_text: ['', ' Comfortable developing low-level instrument control software', 'Description', ' Comfortable with software development best practices', ' PhD in physics, quantum information, electrical engineering, or equivalent experience Experience in testing and calibrating multi-qubit systems Proficient in a scientific programming environment (Python and/or Julia) Excellent skills in problem solving, organization, and communication Demonstrated experience in three of the following: Testing and analysis of superconducting microwave/RF circuits Two qubit gate optimization and system identification State-of-the-art quantum benchmarking techniques Multiplexed readout of quantum system Automation of complex experiments, analysis, and control instrumentation', ' Comfortable developing low-level instrument control software Comfortable with software development best practices Troubleshooting and operation/construction of cryogenic hardware Experience with nanofabrication of chip scale devices', ' Testing and analysis of superconducting microwave/RF circuits', ' Multiplexed readout of quantum system', 'Company', ' Experience in testing and calibrating multi-qubit systems', ' Two qubit gate optimization and system identification', ' Excellent skills in problem solving, organization, and communication', ' PhD in physics, quantum information, electrical engineering, or equivalent experience', ' Demonstrated experience in three of the following:', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Automation of complex experiments, analysis, and control instrumentation', ' Troubleshooting and operation/construction of cryogenic hardware', ' State-of-the-art quantum benchmarking techniques', ' Proficient in a scientific programming environment (Python and/or Julia)', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Experience with nanofabrication of chip scale devices']

['', ' Knowledge of software engineering best practices across the development lifecycle, including agile methodologies, coding standards, code reviews, source management, build processes, testing, and operations', ' Keep up to date with advances in big data technologies and run pilots to design the data architecture to scale with the increased data volume using AWS.', ' Interface with other technology teams to extract, transform, and load data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS big data technologies', 'Description', ' Proven interpersonal skills and standout colleague.', ' 6+ years of relevant work experience in Big data engineering, ETL pipeline development, Data Modeling, and Data Architecture. Expert-level skills in writing and optimizing SQL. Proven experience with MPP databases. Proficiency in one of the programming languages - python, ruby, java or similar. Experience with AWS stack and Big Data Technologies such as Spark, Hive, Presto etc. Experience operating very large scale data warehouses, data lakes and building streaming data pipelines. Proven interpersonal skills and standout colleague. A real passion for technology. We are looking for someone who is keen to demonstrate their existing skills while trying new approaches.', ' Experience with AWS stack and Big Data Technologies such as Spark, Hive, Presto etc.', ' Proven experience with MPP databases.', ' Interface with cross functional teams, gathering requirements and delivering data solutions.', ' 8+ years of experience as a Data Engineer, BI Engineer or related field in a company with large, complex data sources.', ' Proficiency in one of the programming languages - python, ruby, java or similar.', 'Company', ' Demonstrable track record of dealing well with ambiguity, ability to self-motivate, prioritizing needs, and delivering results in a dynamic environment.', ' Proven success in communicating with users, other technical teams, and senior management to collect requirements, describe data modeling decisions and data engineering strategy.', ' Duties & responsibilities for this role will include:', ' A real passion for technology. We are looking for someone who is keen to demonstrate their existing skills while trying new approaches.', ' Masters in computer science, mathematics, statistics, economics, or other quantitative fields. 8+ years of experience as a Data Engineer, BI Engineer or related field in a company with large, complex data sources. Extensive experience with Big Data technologies such as Hive/Spark, AWS EMR, AWS Glue, AWS Lambda and Kinesis. Knowledge of software engineering best practices across the development lifecycle, including agile methodologies, coding standards, code reviews, source management, build processes, testing, and operations Proven success in communicating with users, other technical teams, and senior management to collect requirements, describe data modeling decisions and data engineering strategy. Familiarity with data quality automation. Demonstrable track record of dealing well with ambiguity, ability to self-motivate, prioritizing needs, and delivering results in a dynamic environment. Ability to work on a diverse team or with a diverse range of coworkers', ' 6+ years of relevant work experience in Big data engineering, ETL pipeline development, Data Modeling, and Data Architecture.', ' Experience operating very large scale data warehouses, data lakes and building streaming data pipelines.', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Masters in computer science, mathematics, statistics, economics, or other quantitative fields.', ' Familiarity with data quality automation.', ' Design, implement, and operate stable, scalable, low cost solutions to flow data from production systems into the data warehouse and into end-user facing applications', ' Expert-level skills in writing and optimizing SQL.', ' Create extensible designs and easy to maintain solutions with the long term vision in mind', ' Data modeling to support machine learning model training and offline, batch inference workflows.', ' Duties & responsibilities for this role will include: Design, implement, and operate stable, scalable, low cost solutions to flow data from production systems into the data warehouse and into end-user facing applications Keep up to date with advances in big data technologies and run pilots to design the data architecture to scale with the increased data volume using AWS. Data modeling to support machine learning model training and offline, batch inference workflows. Develop expertise in a broad range of Amazon’s data resources and know when, how, and which to use and which not to use Interface with other technology teams to extract, transform, and load data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS big data technologies Encourage the organization to adopt next-generation data architecture strategies, proposing both data flows and storage solutions Create extensible designs and easy to maintain solutions with the long term vision in mind Interface with cross functional teams, gathering requirements and delivering data solutions.', ' Develop expertise in a broad range of Amazon’s data resources and know when, how, and which to use and which not to use', ' Encourage the organization to adopt next-generation data architecture strategies, proposing both data flows and storage solutions', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Ability to work on a diverse team or with a diverse range of coworkers', ' Extensive experience with Big Data technologies such as Hive/Spark, AWS EMR, AWS Glue, AWS Lambda and Kinesis.']

['', 'About The Role', 'Anticipated graduation between Winter 2021-Bpring 2022Ability to communicate effectively with both technical and business partnersResearch mentality with a bias towards action to structure a project from idea to experimentation to prototype to implementationExperience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), as well as causal inferenceIndependence, excellent communication, and outstanding follow-through - you energetically tackle your work and love the responsibility of being individually empowered', 'Work with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutions', 'Here Are The Teams That Make It Happen', 'Platform:', 'Current Ph.D. student majoring in Computer Science, Economics, Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fieldsKnowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics, machine learning, optimization, economics, and analyticsExperience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis, testing, and model developmentProficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Python', 'Proficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Python', 'Knowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics, machine learning, optimization, economics, and analytics', 'Ability to communicate effectively with both technical and business partners', 'What You’ll Do', 'Experience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), as well as causal inference', 'Experience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis, testing, and model development', 'Work with your mentor closely to scope a project, define the problem, and develop and prototype the solution using data-driven approaches', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Research mentality with a bias towards action to structure a project from idea to experimentation to prototype to implementation', 'Independence, excellent communication, and outstanding follow-through - you energetically tackle your work and love the responsibility of being individually empowered', "Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides interns will tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems; efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system; developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network; optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate all aspects of our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.", 'Rides', 'Current Ph.D. student majoring in Computer Science, Economics, Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields', "Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Interns on the Platform team will work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization, and ranking.", 'Establish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentation', 'Present findings to business leaders to inform decisions', 'Anticipated graduation between Winter 2021-Bpring 2022', 'Work with your mentor closely to scope a project, define the problem, and develop and prototype the solution using data-driven approachesWork with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutionsPresent findings to business leaders to inform decisionsEstablish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentationConduct experiments to advise product decisions', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eat is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Eats interns will work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and discover insights to improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.", 'Preferred Qualifications', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eat is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Eats interns will work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and discover insights to improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides interns will tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems; efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system; developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network; optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate all aspects of our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Interns on the Platform team will work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization, and ranking.", 'Eats:', 'Conduct experiments to advise product decisions']

exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis, testing, and model developmentProficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Python', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eats is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Data scientists on Eats come from a variety of technical backgrounds and work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.", 'Proficiency with Java', 'Basic Qualifications', "Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Platform Data Scientists work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization and ranking, and experimentation design and analysis for new algorithm/feature/product launches.", "Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate all aspects of Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides Data Scientists tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems, efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system, developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network, optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.", "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eats is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Data scientists on Eats come from a variety of technical backgrounds and work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate all aspects of Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides Data Scientists tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems, efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system, developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network, optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Platform Data Scientists work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization and ranking, and experimentation design and analysis for new algorithm/feature/product launches.", 'Rides', 'Currently pursuing a Ph.D. in Statistics, Economics, Computer Science, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields with an anticipated graduation date in winter 2020-summer 2021', 'Establish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentation', 'Present findings to business leaders to inform decisions', 'Previous industry experience (i.e. internships)', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Experience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), as well as causal inference', 'Eats:', 'Leverage data to understand product performance and identify improvement opportunities', 'Build intelligent products to provide the best user experience']

job_title: Quantum Research Scientist, Test and Measurement
job_text: ['', ' Comfortable developing low-level instrument control software', 'Description', ' Comfortable with software development best practices', ' PhD in physics, quantum information, electrical engineering, or equivalent experience Experience in testing and calibrating multi-qubit systems Proficient in a scientific programming environment (Python and/or Julia) Excellent skills in problem solving, organization, and communication Demonstrated experience in three of the following: Testing and analysis of superconducting microwave/RF circuits Two qubit gate optimization and system identification State-of-the-art quantum benchmarking techniques Multiplexed readout of quantum system Automation of complex experiments, analysis, and control instrumentation', ' Comfortable developing low-level instrument control software Comfortable with software development best practices Troubleshooting and operation/construction of cryogenic hardware Experience with nanofabrication of chip scale devices', ' Testing and analysis of superconducting microwave/RF circuits', ' Multiplexed readout of quantum system', 'Company', ' Experience in testing and calibrating multi-qubit systems', ' Two qubit gate optimization and system identification', ' Excellent skills in problem solving, organization, and communication', ' PhD in physics, quantum information, electrical engineering, or equivalent experience', ' Demonstrated experience in three of the following:', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Automation of complex experiments, analysis, and control instrumentation', ' Troubleshooting and operation/construction of cryogenic hardware', ' State-of-the-art quantum benchmarking techniques', ' Proficient in a scientific programming environment (Python and/or Julia)', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Experience with nanofabrication of chip scale devices']

['', ' Knowledge of software engineering best practices across the development lifecycle, including agile methodologies, coding standards, code reviews, source management, build processes, testing, and operations', ' Keep up to date with advances in big data technologies and run pilots to design the data architecture to scale with the increased data volume using AWS.', ' Interface with other technology teams to extract, transform, and load data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS big data technologies', 'Description', ' Proven interpersonal skills and standout colleague.', ' 6+ years of relevant work experience in Big data engineering, ETL pipeline development, Data Modeling, and Data Architecture. Expert-level skills in writing and optimizing SQL. Proven experience with MPP databases. Proficiency in one of the programming languages - python, ruby, java or similar. Experience with AWS stack and Big Data Technologies such as Spark, Hive, Presto etc. Experience operating very large scale data warehouses, data lakes and building streaming data pipelines. Proven interpersonal skills and standout colleague. A real passion for technology. We are looking for someone who is keen to demonstrate their existing skills while trying new approaches.', ' Experience with AWS stack and Big Data Technologies such as Spark, Hive, Presto etc.', ' Proven experience with MPP databases.', ' Interface with cross functional teams, gathering requirements and delivering data solutions.', ' 8+ years of experience as a Data Engineer, BI Engineer or related field in a company with large, complex data sources.', ' Proficiency in one of the programming languages - python, ruby, java or similar.', 'Company', ' Demonstrable track record of dealing well with ambiguity, ability to self-motivate, prioritizing needs, and delivering results in a dynamic environment.', ' Proven success in communicating with users, other technical teams, and senior management to collect requirements, describe data modeling decisions and data engineering strategy.', ' Duties & responsibilities for this role will include:', ' A real passion for technology. We are looking for someone who is keen to demonstrate their existing skills while trying new approaches.', ' Masters in computer science, mathematics, statistics, economics, or other quantitative fields. 8+ years of experience as a Data Engineer, BI Engineer or related field in a company with large, complex data sources. Extensive experience with Big Data technologies such as Hive/Spark, AWS EMR, AWS Glue, AWS Lambda and Kinesis. Knowledge of software engineering best practices across the development lifecycle, including agile methodologies, coding standards, code reviews, source management, build processes, testing, and operations Proven success in communicating with users, other technical teams, and senior management to collect requirements, describe data modeling decisions and data engineering strategy. Familiarity with data quality automation. Demonstrable track record of dealing well with ambiguity, ability to self-motivate, prioritizing needs, and delivering results in a dynamic environment. Ability to work on a diverse team or with a diverse range of coworkers', ' 6+ years of relevant work experience in Big data engineering, ETL pipeline development, Data Modeling, and Data Architecture.', ' Experience operating very large scale data warehouses, data lakes and building streaming data pipelines.', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Masters in computer science, mathematics, statistics, economics, or other quantitative fields.', ' Familiarity with data quality automation.', ' Design, implement, and operate stable, scalable, low cost solutions to flow data from production systems into the data warehouse and into end-user facing applications', ' Expert-level skills in writing and optimizing SQL.', ' Create extensible designs and easy to maintain solutions with the long term vision in mind', ' Data modeling to support machine learning model training and offline, batch inference workflows.', ' Duties & responsibilities for this role will include: Design, implement, and operate stable, scalable, low cost solutions to flow data from production systems into the data warehouse and into end-user facing applications Keep up to date with advances in big data technologies and run pilots to design the data architecture to scale with the increased data volume using AWS. Data modeling to support machine learning model training and offline, batch inference workflows. Develop expertise in a broad range of Amazon’s data resources and know when, how, and which to use and which not to use Interface with other technology teams to extract, transform, and load data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS big data technologies Encourage the organization to adopt next-generation data architecture strategies, proposing both data flows and storage solutions Create extensible designs and easy to maintain solutions with the long term vision in mind Interface with cross functional teams, gathering requirements and delivering data solutions.', ' Develop expertise in a broad range of Amazon’s data resources and know when, how, and which to use and which not to use', ' Encourage the organization to adopt next-generation data architecture strategies, proposing both data flows and storage solutions', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Ability to work on a diverse team or with a diverse range of coworkers', ' Extensive experience with Big Data technologies such as Hive/Spark, AWS EMR, AWS Glue, AWS Lambda and Kinesis.']

['', 'About The Role', 'Anticipated graduation between Winter 2021-Bpring 2022Ability to communicate effectively with both technical and business partnersResearch mentality with a bias towards action to structure a project from idea to experimentation to prototype to implementationExperience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), as well as causal inferenceIndependence, excellent communication, and outstanding follow-through - you energetically tackle your work and love the responsibility of being individually empowered', 'Work with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutions', 'Here Are The Teams That Make It Happen', 'Platform:', 'Current Ph.D. student majoring in Computer Science, Economics, Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fieldsKnowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics, machine learning, optimization, economics, and analyticsExperience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis, testing, and model developmentProficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Python', 'Proficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Python', 'Knowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics, machine learning, optimization, economics, and analytics', 'Ability to communicate effectively with both technical and business partners', 'What You’ll Do', 'Experience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), as well as causal inference', 'Experience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis, testing, and model development', 'Work with your mentor closely to scope a project, define the problem, and develop and prototype the solution using data-driven approaches', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Research mentality with a bias towards action to structure a project from idea to experimentation to prototype to implementation', 'Independence, excellent communication, and outstanding follow-through - you energetically tackle your work and love the responsibility of being individually empowered', "Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides interns will tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems; efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system; developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network; optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate all aspects of our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.", 'Rides', 'Current Ph.D. student majoring in Computer Science, Economics, Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields', "Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Interns on the Platform team will work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization, and ranking.", 'Establish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentation', 'Present findings to business leaders to inform decisions', 'Anticipated graduation between Winter 2021-Bpring 2022', 'Work with your mentor closely to scope a project, define the problem, and develop and prototype the solution using data-driven approachesWork with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutionsPresent findings to business leaders to inform decisionsEstablish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentationConduct experiments to advise product decisions', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eat is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Eats interns will work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and discover insights to improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.", 'Preferred Qualifications', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eat is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Eats interns will work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and discover insights to improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides interns will tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems; efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system; developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network; optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate all aspects of our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Interns on the Platform team will work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization, and ranking.", 'Eats:', 'Conduct experiments to advise product decisions']

exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis, testing, and model developmentProficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Python', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eats is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Data scientists on Eats come from a variety of technical backgrounds and work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.", 'Proficiency with Java', 'Basic Qualifications', "Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Platform Data Scientists work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization and ranking, and experimentation design and analysis for new algorithm/feature/product launches.", "Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate all aspects of Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides Data Scientists tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems, efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system, developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network, optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.", "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eats is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Data scientists on Eats come from a variety of technical backgrounds and work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate all aspects of Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides Data Scientists tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems, efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system, developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network, optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Platform Data Scientists work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization and ranking, and experimentation design and analysis for new algorithm/feature/product launches.", 'Rides', 'Currently pursuing a Ph.D. in Statistics, Economics, Computer Science, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields with an anticipated graduation date in winter 2020-summer 2021', 'Establish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentation', 'Present findings to business leaders to inform decisions', 'Previous industry experience (i.e. internships)', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Experience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), as well as causal inference', 'Eats:', 'Leverage data to understand product performance and identify improvement opportunities', 'Build intelligent products to provide the best user experience']

['', ' Knowledge of software engineering best practices across the development lifecycle, including agile methodologies, coding standards, code reviews, source management, build processes, testing, and operations', ' Keep up to date with advances in big data technologies and run pilots to design the data architecture to scale with the increased data volume using AWS.', ' Interface with other technology teams to extract, transform, and load data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS big data technologies', 'Description', ' Proven interpersonal skills and standout colleague.', ' 6+ years of relevant work experience in Big data engineering, ETL pipeline development, Data Modeling, and Data Architecture. Expert-level skills in writing and optimizing SQL. Proven experience with MPP databases. Proficiency in one of the programming languages - python, ruby, java or similar. Experience with AWS stack and Big Data Technologies such as Spark, Hive, Presto etc. Experience operating very large scale data warehouses, data lakes and building streaming data pipelines. Proven interpersonal skills and standout colleague. A real passion for technology. We are looking for someone who is keen to demonstrate their existing skills while trying new approaches.', ' Experience with AWS stack and Big Data Technologies such as Spark, Hive, Presto etc.', ' Proven experience with MPP databases.', ' Interface with cross functional teams, gathering requirements and delivering data solutions.', ' 8+ years of experience as a Data Engineer, BI Engineer or related field in a company with large, complex data sources.', ' Proficiency in one of the programming languages - python, ruby, java or similar.', 'Company', ' Demonstrable track record of dealing well with ambiguity, ability to self-motivate, prioritizing needs, and delivering results in a dynamic environment.', ' Proven success in communicating with users, other technical teams, and senior management to collect requirements, describe data modeling decisions and data engineering strategy.', ' Duties & responsibilities for this role will include:', ' A real passion for technology. We are looking for someone who is keen to demonstrate their existing skills while trying new approaches.', ' Masters in computer science, mathematics, statistics, economics, or other quantitative fields. 8+ years of experience as a Data Engineer, BI Engineer or related field in a company with large, complex data sources. Extensive experience with Big Data technologies such as Hive/Spark, AWS EMR, AWS Glue, AWS Lambda and Kinesis. Knowledge of software engineering best practices across the development lifecycle, including agile methodologies, coding standards, code reviews, source management, build processes, testing, and operations Proven success in communicating with users, other technical teams, and senior management to collect requirements, describe data modeling decisions and data engineering strategy. Familiarity with data quality automation. Demonstrable track record of dealing well with ambiguity, ability to self-motivate, prioritizing needs, and delivering results in a dynamic environment. Ability to work on a diverse team or with a diverse range of coworkers', ' 6+ years of relevant work experience in Big data engineering, ETL pipeline development, Data Modeling, and Data Architecture.', ' Experience operating very large scale data warehouses, data lakes and building streaming data pipelines.', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Masters in computer science, mathematics, statistics, economics, or other quantitative fields.', ' Familiarity with data quality automation.', ' Design, implement, and operate stable, scalable, low cost solutions to flow data from production systems into the data warehouse and into end-user facing applications', ' Expert-level skills in writing and optimizing SQL.', ' Create extensible designs and easy to maintain solutions with the long term vision in mind', ' Data modeling to support machine learning model training and offline, batch inference workflows.', ' Duties & responsibilities for this role will include: Design, implement, and operate stable, scalable, low cost solutions to flow data from production systems into the data warehouse and into end-user facing applications Keep up to date with advances in big data technologies and run pilots to design the data architecture to scale with the increased data volume using AWS. Data modeling to support machine learning model training and offline, batch inference workflows. Develop expertise in a broad range of Amazon’s data resources and know when, how, and which to use and which not to use Interface with other technology teams to extract, transform, and load data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS big data technologies Encourage the organization to adopt next-generation data architecture strategies, proposing both data flows and storage solutions Create extensible designs and easy to maintain solutions with the long term vision in mind Interface with cross functional teams, gathering requirements and delivering data solutions.', ' Develop expertise in a broad range of Amazon’s data resources and know when, how, and which to use and which not to use', ' Encourage the organization to adopt next-generation data architecture strategies, proposing both data flows and storage solutions', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Ability to work on a diverse team or with a diverse range of coworkers', ' Extensive experience with Big Data technologies such as Hive/Spark, AWS EMR, AWS Glue, AWS Lambda and Kinesis.']

job_text: ['', 'Rider/Driver Incentives: Owns the Subscription Plan, Rewards/Loyalty Plan, and Promotions that are regularly sent out; they build production ML models, run and analyze network-level experiments, and use mechanism design theory to design incentives.', "What You'll Do", 'Proficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Spark.', 'About The Role', 'Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate all aspects of Uber’s core ridesharing products.', 'Work with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutions', 'Here Are The Teams That Make It Happen', 'Ability to use a language like Python or R to work efficiently at scale with large data sets.', 'Experience with causal ML methods is a plus', 'Solve ambiguous, models for applications including pricing, targeting, and experimentationWork with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutionsPresent findings to business leaders to inform decisionsSolve ambiguous, challenging business problems using data-driven approaches.Work closely with multi-functional leads to develop technical vision and drive team direction.Establish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentation.Communicate with senior management and multi-functional teams.', balance & reliabilityRider/Driver Incentives: Owns the Subscription Plan, Rewards/Loyalty Plan, and Promotions that are regularly sent out; they build production ML models, run and analyze network-level experiments, and use mechanism design theory to design incentives.', 'Tech lead experience and passion for mentoring ', 'Build statistical, optimization, and machine learning models for applications including pricing, targeting, and experimentation', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Experience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis and testing, and model development', "Ph.D., Responsible for fare accuracy, UX, and real-time fare generation. They build large-scale real-time machine learning models to predict travel time and distance more accurately; optimize parameters to make upfront price experience better; prevent defect trips for drivers using product innovations, etc.', 'Establish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentation.', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly expanding on-demand food delivery business currently operating in more than 45 countries globally.", 'Pricing: Maximize efficiency and maintain reliability in the three-sided marketplace (eater, courier/delivery partner, and restaurant) of Uber Eats. Our algorithms operate globally at a scale of hundreds of thousands of restaurants, millions of delivery partners, tens of millions of eaters, and billions of dollars per year.', 'Experience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), as well as causal inference.Experience in algorithm development and prototyping.Experience with causal ML methods is a plusTech lead experience and passion for mentoring Experience with productionizing algorithms for real-time systemsExpertise in convex programming, computational optimization, and operations research', 'Present findings to business leaders to inform decisions', "Ph.D., M.S. or Bachelors degree in Statistics, Economics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields. Our algorithms operate globally at a scale of hundreds of thousands of restaurants, millions of delivery partners, tens of millions of eaters, and billions of dollars per year.Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate all aspects of Uber’s core ridesharing products.", 'Experience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), as well as causal inference.', 'Eats: ', 'Platforms: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber’s trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally.Fares: Platforms and UX for upfront pricing, promotions, and fare generation for all of Uber worldwide. They build large-scale real-time machine learning models to predict travel time and distance more accurately; optimize parameters to make upfront price experience better; prevent defect trips for drivers using product innovations, etc.', 'Pricing: Responsible for modeling rider and driver behavior,setting prices to optimize long run network efficiency, and dynamically adjusting those prices to ensure balance & reliability']

['', 'About The Role', 'Anticipated graduation between Winter 2021-Bpring 2022Ability to communicate effectively with both technical and business partnersResearch mentality with a bias towards action to structure a project from idea to experimentation to prototype to implementationExperience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), as well as causal inferenceIndependence, excellent communication, and outstanding follow-through - you energetically tackle your work and love the responsibility of being individually empowered', 'Work with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutions', 'Here Are The Teams That Make It Happen', 'Platform:', 'Current Ph.D. student majoring in Computer Science, Economics, Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fieldsKnowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics, machine learning, optimization, economics, and analyticsExperience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis, testing, and model developmentProficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Python', 'Proficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Python', 'Knowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics, machine learning, optimization, economics, and analytics', 'Ability to communicate effectively with both technical and business partners', 'What You’ll Do', 'Experience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), as well as causal inference', 'Experience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis, testing, and model development', 'Work with your mentor closely to scope a project, define the problem, and develop and prototype the solution using data-driven approaches', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Research mentality with a bias towards action to structure a project from idea to experimentation to prototype to implementation', 'Independence, excellent communication, and outstanding follow-through - you energetically tackle your work and love the responsibility of being individually empowered', "Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides interns will tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems; efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system; developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network; optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate all aspects of our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.", 'Rides', 'Current Ph.D. student majoring in Computer Science, Economics, Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields', "Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Interns on the Platform team will work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization, and ranking.", 'Establish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentation', 'Present findings to business leaders to inform decisions', 'Anticipated graduation between Winter 2021-Bpring 2022', 'Work with your mentor closely to scope a project, define the problem, and develop and prototype the solution using data-driven approachesWork with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutionsPresent findings to business leaders to inform decisionsEstablish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentationConduct experiments to advise product decisions', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eat is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Eats interns will work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and discover insights to improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.", 'Preferred Qualifications', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eat is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Eats interns will work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and discover insights to improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides interns will tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems; efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system; developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network; optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate all aspects of our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Interns on the Platform team will work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization, and ranking.", 'Eats:', 'Conduct experiments to advise product decisions']

exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis, testing, and model developmentProficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Python', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eats is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Data scientists on Eats come from a variety of technical backgrounds and work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.", 'Proficiency with Java', 'Basic Qualifications', "Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Platform Data Scientists work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization and ranking, and experimentation design and analysis for new algorithm/feature/product launches.", "Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate all aspects of Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides Data Scientists tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems, efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system, developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network, optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.", "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eats is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Data scientists on Eats come from a variety of technical backgrounds and work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate all aspects of Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides Data Scientists tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems, efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system, developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network, optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Platform Data Scientists work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization and ranking, and experimentation design and analysis for new algorithm/feature/product launches.", 'Rides', 'Currently pursuing a Ph.D. in Statistics, Economics, Computer Science, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields with an anticipated graduation date in winter 2020-summer 2021', 'Establish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentation', 'Present findings to business leaders to inform decisions', 'Previous industry experience (i.e. internships)', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Experience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), as well as causal inference', 'Eats:', 'Leverage data to understand product performance and identify improvement opportunities', 'Build intelligent products to provide the best user experience']

['', ' Knowledge of software engineering best practices across the development lifecycle, including agile methodologies, coding standards, code reviews, source management, build processes, testing, and operations', ' Keep up to date with advances in big data technologies and run pilots to design the data architecture to scale with the increased data volume using AWS.', ' Interface with other technology teams to extract, transform, and load data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS big data technologies', 'Description', ' Proven interpersonal skills and standout colleague.', ' 6+ years of relevant work experience in Big data engineering, ETL pipeline development, Data Modeling, and Data Architecture. Expert-level skills in writing and optimizing SQL. Proven experience with MPP databases. Proficiency in one of the programming languages - python, ruby, java or similar. Experience with AWS stack and Big Data Technologies such as Spark, Hive, Presto etc. Experience operating very large scale data warehouses, data lakes and building streaming data pipelines. Proven interpersonal skills and standout colleague. A real passion for technology. We are looking for someone who is keen to demonstrate their existing skills while trying new approaches.', ' Experience with AWS stack and Big Data Technologies such as Spark, Hive, Presto etc.', ' Proven experience with MPP databases.', ' Interface with cross functional teams, gathering requirements and delivering data solutions.', ' 8+ years of experience as a Data Engineer, BI Engineer or related field in a company with large, complex data sources.', ' Proficiency in one of the programming languages - python, ruby, java or similar.', 'Company', ' Demonstrable track record of dealing well with ambiguity, ability to self-motivate, prioritizing needs, and delivering results in a dynamic environment.', ' Proven success in communicating with users, other technical teams, and senior management to collect requirements, describe data modeling decisions and data engineering strategy.', ' Duties & responsibilities for this role will include:', ' A real passion for technology. We are looking for someone who is keen to demonstrate their existing skills while trying new approaches.', ' Masters in computer science, mathematics, statistics, economics, or other quantitative fields. 8+ years of experience as a Data Engineer, BI Engineer or related field in a company with large, complex data sources. Extensive experience with Big Data technologies such as Hive/Spark, AWS EMR, AWS Glue, AWS Lambda and Kinesis. Knowledge of software engineering best practices across the development lifecycle, including agile methodologies, coding standards, code reviews, source management, build processes, testing, and operations Proven success in communicating with users, other technical teams, and senior management to collect requirements, describe data modeling decisions and data engineering strategy. Familiarity with data quality automation. Demonstrable track record of dealing well with ambiguity, ability to self-motivate, prioritizing needs, and delivering results in a dynamic environment. Ability to work on a diverse team or with a diverse range of coworkers', ' 6+ years of relevant work experience in Big data engineering, ETL pipeline development, Data Modeling, and Data Architecture.', ' Experience operating very large scale data warehouses, data lakes and building streaming data pipelines.', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Masters in computer science, mathematics, statistics, economics, or other quantitative fields.', ' Familiarity with data quality automation.', ' Design, implement, and operate stable, scalable, low cost solutions to flow data from production systems into the data warehouse and into end-user facing applications', ' Expert-level skills in writing and optimizing SQL.', ' Create extensible designs and easy to maintain solutions with the long term vision in mind', ' Data modeling to support machine learning model training and offline, batch inference workflows.', ' Duties & responsibilities for this role will include: Design, implement, and operate stable, scalable, low cost solutions to flow data from production systems into the data warehouse and into end-user facing applications Keep up to date with advances in big data technologies and run pilots to design the data architecture to scale with the increased data volume using AWS. Data modeling to support machine learning model training and offline, batch inference workflows. Develop expertise in a broad range of Amazon’s data resources and know when, how, and which to use and which not to use Interface with other technology teams to extract, transform, and load data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS big data technologies Encourage the organization to adopt next-generation data architecture strategies, proposing both data flows and storage solutions Create extensible designs and easy to maintain solutions with the long term vision in mind Interface with cross functional teams, gathering requirements and delivering data solutions.', ' Develop expertise in a broad range of Amazon’s data resources and know when, how, and which to use and which not to use', ' Encourage the organization to adopt next-generation data architecture strategies, proposing both data flows and storage solutions', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Ability to work on a diverse team or with a diverse range of coworkers', ' Extensive experience with Big Data technologies such as Hive/Spark, AWS EMR, AWS Glue, AWS Lambda and Kinesis.']

you energetically tackle your work and love the responsibility of being individually empowered', 'Work with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutions', 'Here Are The Teams That Make It Happen', 'Platform:', 'Current Ph.D. student majoring in Computer Science, Economics, Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fieldsKnowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics, machine learning, optimization, economics, and analyticsExperience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis, testing, and model developmentProficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Python', 'Proficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Python', 'Knowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics, machine learning, optimization, economics, and analytics', 'Ability to communicate effectively with both technical and business partners', 'What You’ll Do', 'Experience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments), as well as causal inference', 'Experience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis, testing, and model development', 'Work with your mentor closely to scope a project, define the problem, and develop and prototype the solution using data-driven approaches', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Research mentality with a bias towards action to structure a project from idea to experimentation to prototype to implementation', 'Independence, excellent communication, and outstanding follow-through - you energetically tackle your work and love the responsibility of being individually empowered', "Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides interns will tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems; efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system; developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network; optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate all aspects of our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.", 'Rides', 'Current Ph.D. student majoring in Computer Science, Economics, Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields', "Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Interns on the Platform team will work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization, and ranking.", 'Establish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentation', 'Present findings to business leaders to inform decisions', 'Anticipated graduation between Winter 2021-Bpring 2022', 'Work with your mentor closely to scope a project, define the problem, and develop and prototype the solution using data-driven approachesWork with engineers and product managers to turn data science prototypes into robust, reliable solutionsPresent findings to business leaders to inform decisionsEstablish standard methodologies for data science including modeling, coding, analytics, optimization, and experimentationConduct experiments to advise product decisions', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eat is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Eats interns will work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and discover insights to improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.", 'Preferred Qualifications', "Eats: Uber Eats is Uber's ambitious and rapidly growing on-demand food delivery business currently operating in over 45 countries globally and is the largest outside of China. Eat is a 3-sided marketplace, comprising Eaters, Delivery Partners, and Restaurants. Eats interns will work on exciting and impactful projects that advance our algorithms and discover insights to improve engagement with eaters, merchants, and couriers. Projects include optimizing our eater pricing systems and routing algorithms, modeling and predicting eater and courier behavior on the platform, and improving the efficiency of user acquisition, promotions, courier experience, and merchant onboarding.Rides: Rides Data Science at Uber uses data to improve and automate Uber's core ridesharing products. Rides interns will tackle problems such as optimizing Uber’s short and long term pricing systems; efficiently matching incoming trip requests in Uber’s dispatch system; developing innovative incentive schemes that reward riders and drivers for choosing our network; optimizing pickup and dropoff experiences for both riders and drivers, and developing algorithms and experimentation to make our rider and driver user experience stand out. We also forecast, monitor, and evaluate all aspects of our marketplace and user behavior using both large scale observational data and meticulous experimentation.Platform: Platform Data Science develops the common systems and technical foundations that power Uber's trip experiences externally and core decision making systems internally. Interns on the Platform team will work on building statistical, machine learning, and optimization models for problems like travel time estimation, route optimization, search personalization, and ranking.", 'Eats:', 'Conduct experiments to advise product decisions']
